Container.situation: player returns to the hub after orange_minedispenser. after this conversation finishes, journalist asks player who he thinks is to blame for what happened to oreokastro.

Key.Original: It's nothing, really.
Key.Chinese: 沒什麼啦，真的沒什麼。
Key.French: Ce n'est rien.
Key.Spanish: En realidad no es nada.
Key.Italian: Non ho fatto niente di che, davvero.
Key.Polish: To nic takiego.
Key.Russian: Не нужно благодарностей, правда.
Key.German: Gern geschehen.
Key.Czech: To byla maličkost.
Key.English: It's nothing, really.
Key.Portuguese: Não é nada, sério.
Key.Korean: 별거 아니네. 정말.
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的没什么。
Key.Japanese: 大したことじゃないよ。
Key.Turkish: Gerçekten, önemli değil.

Key.Original: Sure - fire away.
Key.Chinese: 好，問吧。
Key.French: Pas de problème. J'écoute.
Key.Spanish: Claro, dispara.
Key.Italian: Certo, spara.
Key.Polish: Jasne, wal.
Key.Russian: Конечно, задавайте.
Key.German: Klar, immer raus damit.
Key.Czech: Jasně, ptej se.
Key.English: Sure - fire away.
Key.Portuguese: Claro. Manda bala.
Key.Korean: 물론. 말해보게.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的 - 你问吧。
Key.Japanese: ああ - 何でも聞いてくれ。
Key.Turkish: Elbette, başlayabilirsin.

Key.Original: Honestly, Nathan, all this information? It's a godsend. You've given me loads to work with here.
Key.Chinese: Nathan，你告訴我的資訊，簡直像是從天而降的好運。我有了好多報導的題材。
Key.French: Nathan, ces informations n'ont pas de prix. Grâce à vous, j'ai beaucoup de matière.
Key.Spanish: Sinceramente, Nathan, toda esta información... me ha venido de perlas. Me has dado un montón de material con el que trabajar.
Key.Italian: Seriamente, Nathan, tutte queste informazioni sono una manna dal cielo. Mi hai fornito molto materiale con cui lavorare.
Key.Polish: Naprawdę, Nathanie, te informacje z nieba mi spadły. Dzięki tobie mam nad czym pracować.
Key.Russian: Честное слово, Натан, вся эта информация - настоящая находка. Вы дали мне массу материала для работы.
Key.German: Ehrlich, Nathan, Ihre ganzen Informationen waren die Rettung. Sie haben mir einen haufen Material gegeben.
Key.Czech: Opravdu, Nathane. Tyhle všechny informace jsou skutečně cenné. Pověděl jsi mi toho tolik!
Key.English: Honestly, Nathan, all this information? It's a godsend. You've given me loads to work with here.
Key.Portuguese: Sinceramente, Nathan, todas essas informações? Foram uma dádiva dos céus. Você me deu muito material para trabalhar aqui.
Key.Korean: 솔직히 네이선씨, 이 모든 정보가 말이에요? 정말 뜻밖의 행운 같아요. 선생님 덕분에 이 회사에서 제 역량이 커지는 것 같습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 说真的，Nathan，所有这些信息？它们是天赐之物。你给了我大量可以挖掘的资料。
Key.Japanese: ネイサン、あなたから頂いた沢山の情報、本当に助かります。おかげで使える資料が沢山用意できました。
Key.Turkish: Gerçekten, Nathan, tüm bu bilgiler? Hızır gibi yetişti. Burada bana üzerinde çalışacak bir sürü şey verdin.

Key.Original: Now, there's just one last question I'd like to ask you. It's subjective, so, take your time.
Key.Chinese: 現在我想問你最後一個問題。答案很主觀，你可以慢慢思考。
Key.French: J'aimerais vous poser une dernière question. C'est très subjectif, alors prenez votre temps.
Key.Spanish: Me gustaría preguntarte una última cosa. Es algo subjetivo, así que no tienes por qué darte prisa.
Key.Italian: Ora c'è solo un'ultima domanda che vorrei chiederti. È soggettiva, quindi prenditi il tuo tempo per rispondere.
Key.Polish: Mam do ciebie ostatnie pytanie. Nie o fakty, a o twoją opinię, więc nie spiesz się z odpowiedzią.
Key.Russian: У меня к вам есть один последний вопрос. Он достаточно субъективный, так что не спешите с ответом.
Key.German: Jetzt habe ich nur noch eine letzte Frage an Sie. Sie ist subjektiv, also lassen Sie sich ruhig Zeit mit der Antwort.
Key.Czech: Chtěla bych ti položit poslední otázku. Je subjektivní, takže si odpověď promysli.
Key.English: Now, there's just one last question I'd like to ask you. It's subjective, so, take your time.
Key.Portuguese: Agora, tem só uma última pergunta que gostaria de fazer. É subjetiva, então, pode pensar o quanto quiser.
Key.Korean: 이제 마지막 질문 하나만 남았어요. 이건 주관적일 수 있는데요. 천천히 답해주셔도 되요.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我只有最后一个问题想问你。这是个主观问题，所以，你可以慢慢回答，不着急。
Key.Japanese: あと一つだけ、最後に質問があるんですが。主観的な内容なので、時間を掛けていただいて構いません。
Key.Turkish: Şimdi sana sormak istediğim son bir soru var. Öznel bir soru, bu yüzden istediğin kadar düşün.

Key.Original: In your opinion, who's most to blame for all the suffering in Oreokastro?
Key.Chinese: 依你看，Oreokastro 今日困境的推手中，誰最該受到譴責？
Key.French: À votre avis, qui est responsable du désastre d'Oreokastro ?
Key.Spanish: En tu opinión, ¿quién es el mayor culpable de todo el sufrimiento de Oreokastro?
Key.Italian: Secondo te chi ha maggiori responsabilità per tutta la sofferenza causata a Oreokastro?
Key.Polish: Kto według ciebie w największym stopniu odpowiada za całe cierpienie w Oreokastro?
Key.Russian: Как вы считаете, кто больше всех виноват во всем этом кровопролитии, что произошло в Ореокастро?
Key.German: Wer ist Ihrer meinung nach am Leid von Oreokastro verantwortlich?
Key.Czech: Kdo je podle tvého názoru za všechno to utrpení v Oreokastru odpovědný?
Key.English: In your opinion, who's most to blame for all the suffering in Oreokastro?
Key.Portuguese: Na sua opinião, quem é o maior culpado por todo o sofrimento em Oreokastro?
Key.Korean: 선생님 생각하시기에 오레오카스트로에 발생한 모든 처참한 상황에 가장 책임이 있는 자는 누구일까요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你看来，对于 Oreokastro 受到的所有伤害，谁是罪魁祸首？
Key.Japanese: あなたの見た限り、オレオカストロにおける苦しみについて最も責任が重いのは誰だと思いますか？
Key.Turkish: Sence Oreokastro’da yaşanan tüm bu ızdırap için en çok kimi suçlayabiliriz?

Key.Original: NATO?
Key.Chinese: NATO？
Key.French: L'OTAN ?
Key.Spanish: ¿La OTAN?
Key.Italian: La NATO?
Key.Polish: NATO?
Key.Russian: НАТО?
Key.German: Die NATO?
Key.Czech: NATO
Key.English: NATO?
Key.Portuguese: A OTAN?
Key.Korean: NATO?
Key.Chinesesimp: NATO？
Key.Japanese: NATO？
Key.Turkish: NATO?

Key.Original: The guerrillas?
Key.Chinese: 游擊軍？
Key.French: Les insurgés ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Los guerrilleros?
Key.Italian: I guerriglieri?
Key.Polish: Partyzanci?
Key.Russian: Партизаны?
Key.German: Die Guerillas?
Key.Czech: Partyzáni?
Key.English: The guerrillas?
Key.Portuguese: Os guerrilheiros?
Key.Korean: 게릴라들?
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队？
Key.Japanese: ゲリラ？
Key.Turkish: Gerillalar?

Key.Original: CSAT?
Key.Chinese: CSAT？
Key.French: Le CSAT ?
Key.Spanish: ¿El CSAT?
Key.Italian: La CSAT?
Key.Polish: CSAT?
Key.Russian: CSAT?
Key.German: CSAT?
Key.Czech: CSAT?
Key.English: CSAT?
Key.Portuguese: A CSAT?
Key.Korean: CSAT?
Key.Chinesesimp: CSAT？
Key.Japanese: CSAT？
Key.Turkish: CSAT?

Key.Original: The Altis Armed Forces?
Key.Chinese: Altis Armed Forces？
Key.French: Les forces gouvernementales de l'AAF ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Las Fuerzas Armadas de Altis?
Key.Italian: Le Forze armate di Altis?
Key.Polish: Siły Zbrojne Altis?
Key.Russian: Вооруженные силы Алтиса?
Key.German: Die AAF?
Key.Czech: Ozbrojené síly Altisu?
Key.English: The Altis Armed Forces?
Key.Portuguese: As Forças Armadas de Altis?
Key.Korean: 알티스군대?
Key.Chinesesimp: Altis 武装部队？
Key.Japanese: アルティス軍？
Key.Turkish: Altis Silahlı Kuvvetleri?

Key.Original: Or, I don't know, something else?
Key.Chinese: 還是，嗯，另有其人？
Key.French: Ou, je sais pas... Autre chose ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Ninguno de las anteriores?
Key.Italian: O, non so, qualcos'altro?
Key.Polish: A może żadne z nich?
Key.Russian: Или кто-то еще?
Key.German: Oder vielleicht jemand anderes?
Key.Czech: Nebo někdo úplně jiný?
Key.English: Or, I don't know, something else?
Key.Portuguese: Ou, não sei, outro coisa?
Key.Korean: 아니면 다른 누군가요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 或者，什么别的？
Key.Japanese: それとも他の何かでしょうか？
Key.Turkish: Ya da bilmiyorum, başka biri mi?

Container.name: 002_eve_church_open
Container.situation: nato soldiers have cleared the churchyard of landmines, opening the next trigger for a mission.

Key.Original: Mac. Got a quick update for ya.
Key.Chinese: Mac。有消息要告訴你。
Key.French: Mac. J'ai des nouvelles pour toi.
Key.Spanish: Mac, tengo información para ti.
Key.Italian: Mac, ho un rapido aggiornamento per te.
Key.Polish: Mac, sytuacja wygląda następująco…
Key.Russian: Мак. У меня для тебя новости.
Key.German: Mac, ich habe ein kleines Update für dich,
Key.Czech: Macu. Mám pro tebe novinku.
Key.English: Mac. Got a quick update for ya.
Key.Portuguese: Mac. Tenho uma informação ligeira pra você.
Key.Korean: 맥. 소식을 빠르게 전해줌세.
Key.Chinesesimp: Mac。有些新情况告诉你。
Key.Japanese: マック。速報が一つある。
Key.Turkish: Mac. Sana hızlı bir güncelleme.

Key.Original: Yeah, so, NATO have bagged and tagged their dead.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，NATO 收拾完遺體了。
Key.French: Alors l'OTAN a fini d'emballer et d'étiqueter ses morts.
Key.Spanish: Bueno, pues la OTAN ya ha identificado y empaquetado a los fiambres.
Key.Italian: Sì, allora, la NATO ha sigillato ed etichettato i suoi cadaveri.
Key.Polish: NATO spakowało swoich umarlaków.
Key.Russian: Короче, натовцы упаковали своих жмуров.
Key.German: Ja, die NATO hat seine Verstorbenen eingetütet.
Key.Czech: Takže. Pracovníci NATO už své mrtvé dali do pytlů a označili je.
Key.English: Yeah, so, NATO have bagged and tagged their dead.
Key.Portuguese: É, então, a OTAN ensacou e marcou os mortos deles.
Key.Korean: NATO가 그들의 시체에 이름표를 달아줬다는 군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，NATO 已经把他们的阵亡士兵装入运尸袋并打好标签了。
Key.Japanese: NATO 軍が自分とこの死者にタグ付けて遺体袋で持ってった。
Key.Turkish: Evet, NATO ölüleri paketlemiş.

Key.Original: Not really. Anyhoo. It's a half-assed job. Still a bunch of landmines around. Worth checking out?
Key.Chinese: 沒有。隨便啦。但他們就是馬虎掃一下雷而已。附近還是有不少地雷。應該值得過去看看？
Key.French: Pas vraiment. Écoute, le boulot est mal fini. Il reste encore des mines dans le coin. Ça vaut le coup d'y aller ?
Key.Spanish: Qué va. En realidad, aún no han acabado. Aún quedan un montón de minas terrestres por ahí. ¿Te apetece echarles un vistazo?
Key.Italian: Non proprio. Comunque è un lavoro fatto col culo. Ci sono ancora delle mine qua intorno. Vale la pena controllare?
Key.Polish: Jakoś nie. To gówniana robota. Dookoła jeszcze trochę min. Warto to sprawdzić?
Key.Russian: Да вроде бы нет. Как бы там ни было, они делали все на скорою руку, так что здесь до сих пор целая куча мин. Может, стоит проверить?
Key.German: Nicht wirklich. Jedenfalls haben sie die Sache nur halb zuende gebracht. Es liegen immer noch eine Menge Minen rum. Wär das was für uns?
Key.Czech: To bych neřekl. Každopádně. Tohle je pěkně mizerný úkol. Pořád zbývá hromada min. Mrkneme se na ně?
Key.English: Not really. Anyhoo. It's a half-assed job. Still a bunch of landmines around. Worth checking out?
Key.Portuguese: Não exatamente. Enfim. Fizeram um trabalho porco. Ainda tem várias minas terrestres por aí. Será que vale a pena conferir?
Key.Korean: 아니. 아무도. 젠장 일을 이따구로 해놨어. 아직도 주변에 지뢰가 바글바글해. 확인 좀 해줘야겠지?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有啊。这是个该死的工作。附近还有一些地雷。值得去查看下吗？
Key.Japanese: いや別に？とにかくだ。作業は中途半端にしか終わってない。まだ地雷が多数埋まってる状態だ。調べてみるか？
Key.Turkish: Pek sayılmaz. Neyse. Bu işe yaramaz bir iş. Etrafta hâlâ kara mayınları var. Kontrol etmeye değer mi?

Key.Original: I'm listening, bud.
Key.Chinese: 我聽著呢，老兄。
Key.French: Je t'écoute.
Key.Spanish: Te escucho, colega.
Key.Italian: Sono tutto orecchi, amico.
Key.Polish: Słucham cię, stary.
Key.Russian: Говори.
Key.German: Ich bin ganz Ohr, Kumpel.
Key.Czech: Poslouchám, kámo.
Key.English: I'm listening, bud.
Key.Portuguese: Tô ouvindo, parceiro.
Key.Korean: 듣고 있네 친구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在听着呢，伙计。
Key.Japanese: 聞いてるぞ。
Key.Turkish: Dinliyorum, dostum.

Key.Original: Jesus, Andy. Anyone ever mention you got a way with words?
Key.Chinese: 老天，Andy。有人告訴你過，你很會說話嗎？
Key.French: Putain, Andy. On t'a déjà dit que tu manquais de délicatesse ?
Key.Spanish: Joder, Andy. ¿Alguien te ha dicho alguna vez lo elocuente que eres?
Key.Italian: Porca misera, Andy. Non te l'ha mai detto nessuno che ci sai fare con le parole?
Key.Polish: Jezu, Andy. Mówił ci ktoś kiedyś, że prawdziwy z ciebie poeta?
Key.Russian: Господи, Энди. Тебе не говорили, что тебе нужно выбирать выражения?
Key.German: Gott, Andy, hat dir schon mal jemand gesagt, dass du echt eloquent bist?
Key.Czech: Ježíš, Andy. Ty si fakt nebereš servítky.
Key.English: Jesus, Andy. Anyone ever mention you got a way with words?
Key.Portuguese: Cacete, Andy. Já te disseram como você tem jeito com as palavras?
Key.Korean: 이봐, 앤디. 사람들이 자네 말솜씨 없다고 타박 안하나?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，Andy。有人告诉过你挺能说会道的吗？
Key.Japanese: おい、アンディ。言い方に気を付けろって他人に言われたこと無いか？
Key.Turkish: Tanrım, Andy. Daha önce sana kelimelerle aranın iyi olduğunu söyleyen oldu mu?

Key.Original: Yeah. Thanks, Andy. I'll head up there shortly. See what I can do.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。謝啦，Andy。我馬上過去。看看我能做些什麼。
Key.French: Oui. Merci, Andy. Je vais voir si je peux me rendre utile là-bas.
Key.Spanish: Sí, gracias, Andy. Iré allí dentro de poco. Veré lo que puedo hacer.
Key.Italian: Sì, grazie, Andy. Andrò lì a breve. Vedo cosa posso fare.
Key.Polish: Tak. Dzięki, Andy. Zaraz się tam wybiorę. Zobaczę, co mogę zrobić.
Key.Russian: Хорошо. Спасибо, Энди. Скоро выезжаю туда и посмотрю, что я смогу сделать.
Key.German: Klar. Danke, Andy. Ich mach mich gleich auf den Weg und sehe, was ich tun kann.
Key.Czech: Jo. Díky, Andy. Za chvíli se na ně mrknu. Jestli se s nima dá něco dělat.
Key.English: Yeah. Thanks, Andy. I'll head up there shortly. See what I can do.
Key.Portuguese: Vale. Valeu, Andy. Logo mais vou até lá. Ver se dá pra fazer alguma coisa.
Key.Korean: 어. 고맙네, 앤디. 잠깐이면 거기 도착한다구. 어떻게든 해보겠다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，谢谢你，Andy。我很快会到那去。看看有什么我能做的。
Key.Japanese: ああ。了解だ、アンディ。すぐにそっちへ向かう。出来ることがないか見てみよう。
Key.Turkish: Evet. Teşekkürler, Andy. Birazdan oraya giderim. Ne yapabileceğime bir bakalım.

Container.name: 001_hbi_post_escape
Container.situation: player returns from a memory to the town in the present.

Key.Original: Yeah. That's right.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。沒錯。
Key.French: Oui, absolument.
Key.Spanish: Sí, exacto.
Key.Italian: Sì, proprio così.
Key.Polish: Tak. Zgadza się.
Key.Russian: Да. Все верно.
Key.German: Ja, das stimmt.
Key.Czech: Jo. Přesně tak.
Key.English: Yeah. That's right.
Key.Portuguese: É. Isso mesmo.
Key.Korean: 어. 그랬지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，没错。
Key.Japanese: ああ。その通りだ。
Key.Turkish: Evet. Bu doğru.

Key.Original: It's funny, I asked Markos the same thing once. He just... looked at me and shrugged.
Key.Chinese: 真有趣，這件事情我也問過 Markos。他那時只是……看著我，聳聳肩膀。
Key.French: C'est marrant, quand j'ai posé cette même question à Markos, il a simplement haussé les épaules.
Key.Spanish: Qué curioso, una vez le pregunté eso mismo a Markos. Me miró y se limitó a encogerse de hombros.
Key.Italian: Divertente, una volta chiesi a Markos proprio la stessa cosa. Semplicemente… mi guardò e scrollò le spalle.
Key.Polish: Zabawne, zadałem kiedyś Markosowi to samo pytanie. A on… popatrzył na mnie i wzruszył ramionami.
Key.Russian: Да уж, я однажды спросил Маркоса то же самое, на что тот... просто пожал плечами.
Key.German: Lustigerweise habe ich Markos einmal dieselbe Frage gestellt. Er hat mich einfach angesehen und mit den Schultern gezuckt.
Key.Czech: Zvláštní. Přesně na to samý jsem se jednou Markose zeptal. Jenom se na mě podíval a pokrčil rameny.
Key.English: It's funny, I asked Markos the same thing once. He just... looked at me and shrugged.
Key.Portuguese: É engraçado, teve uma vez que perguntei a mesma coisa pro Markos. Ele só… olhou pra mim e deu de ombros.
Key.Korean: 재밌군. 사실 나도 마르코스한테 같은 질문을 했었거든. 그는 단지... 날 보고 어깨를 으쓱하더군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 有意思的是，我有次问过 Markos 同样的事情。他只是...看着我，耸耸肩膀。
Key.Japanese: 実は俺もマーコスに同じことを聞いた。そしたら… 俺の方を見て、肩をすくませるだけだった。
Key.Turkish: Bu çok komik, bir keresinde Markos’a aynısını sordum. O sadece bana bakıp omuz silkti.

Key.Original: Nathan, you said that Alexis had been a recruit in the Altis Armed Forces.
Key.Chinese: Nathan，你說 Alexis 加入了 Altis Armed Forces。
Key.French: Nathan, vous m'avez dit que par le passé, Alexis avait été engagé dans l'AAF.
Key.Spanish: Nathan, dijiste que Alexis había sido un recluta de las Fuerzas Armadas de Altis.
Key.Italian: Nathan, hai detto che Alexis era una recluta delle Forze armate di Altis.
Key.Polish: Nathanie, mówiłeś, że Alexis był rekrutem w Siłach Zbrojnych Altis.
Key.Russian: Натан, вы говорили, что Алексис служил в вооруженных силах Алтиса.
Key.German: Nathan, Sie haben gesagt, dass Alexis ein Rekrut der AAF war.
Key.Czech: Nathane, řekl jsi, že Alexis sloužil jako rekrut v ozbrojených silách Altisu.
Key.English: Nathan, you said that Alexis had been a recruit in the Altis Armed Forces.
Key.Portuguese: Nathan, você disse que o Alexis tinha sido recruta nas Forças Armadas de Altis.
Key.Korean: 네이선씨, 알렉시스가 알티스군에 입대했다고 하셨잖아요.
Key.Chinesesimp: Nathan，你说过 Alexis 曾是 Altis 武装部队的一名士兵。
Key.Japanese: ネイサン、前にアレクシスがアルティス正規軍の新兵だったと言われてましたね。
Key.Turkish: Nathan, Alexis’in Altis Silahlı Kuvvetlerinde bir erat olduğunu söyledin.

Key.Original: Later on, I heard their father had been killed in the civil war. But, I dunno.
Key.Chinese: 之後，我聽說他們的父親死於內戰。我也不清楚。
Key.French: Plus tard, j'ai appris que leur père était mort lors de la guerre civile. Au final, c'est pas facile à expliquer.
Key.Spanish: Después, me enteré de que habían matado a su padre durante la guerra civil. Pero no sé.
Key.Italian: Tempo dopo sentii che loro padre venne ucciso durante la guerra civile. Ma non so.
Key.Polish: Potem słyszałem, że ich ojciec zginął w wojnie domowej. Ale nie wiem.
Key.Russian: Позже я узнал, что их отец был убит в ходе гражданской войны. Но я не знаю точно.
Key.German: Später habe ich gehört, dass ihr Vater im Bürgerkrieg getötet wurde, aber so genau weiß ich das nicht.
Key.Czech: Později jsem zaslechl, že jejich otec padl během občanské války. Ale nevím to jistě.
Key.English: Later on, I heard their father had been killed in the civil war. But, I dunno.
Key.Portuguese: Mais tarde, fiquei sabendo que o pai deles tinha sido morto na guerra civil. Mas sei lá.
Key.Korean: 형제 아버지가 내전에서 사망했다고 나중에 들었어. 하지만. 확실친 않아.
Key.Chinesesimp: 后来，我听说他们的父亲在内战中被杀了。不过，我不清楚。
Key.Japanese: 二人の父親が内戦で死んだっていう話を聞いたのはその後だ。でもはっきりとは分からない。
Key.Turkish: Daha sonra, babalarının iç savaşta öldürüldüğünü duydum. Fakat bilmiyorum.

Key.Original: So, his decision to leave the army - to join the guerrillas - do you know how that came about?
Key.Chinese: 他脫離軍方、加入游擊軍的那份決心，你知道是從何而來的嗎？
Key.French: Savez-vous pourquoi il a décidé de quitter l'armée pour rejoindre les insurgés ?
Key.Spanish: Bueno, ¿sabes por qué decidió abandonar el ejército para unirse a las guerrillas?
Key.Italian: Quindi la decisione di lasciare l'esercito e di unirsi ai guerriglieri… sai da dove proviene?
Key.Polish: Wiesz, co mogło stać za jego decyzją o odejściu z armii i dołączeniu do partyzantów?
Key.Russian: Почему же он решил покинуть армию и присоединиться к повстанцам, – не знаете, как так получилось?
Key.German: Warum hat er sich letztendlich gegen die Armee und für die Guerillas entschieden?
Key.Czech: Takže se rozhodl odejít z armády a přidat se k partyzánům. Nevíš, proč se tak rozhodl?
Key.English: So, his decision to leave the army - to join the guerrillas - do you know how that came about?
Key.Portuguese: Então a decisão dele de sair do exército, para se juntar aos guerrilheiros, você sabe como isso aconteceu?
Key.Korean: 그렇다면 군을 나와 게릴라에 입단하겠다는 그의 결정이 어떻게 나오게 됬는지 뭐 아는 것 있으세요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，他决定离开军队，加入游击队 - 你知道那是怎么回事吗？
Key.Japanese: では、彼の軍を抜けてゲリラに加わるという決断ですが - どのように起きたかご存知でしょうか？
Key.Turkish: Peki, gerillalara katılmak için ordudan ayrılma kararı; bunun nasıl olduğunu biliyor musun?

Key.Original: Whatever his reasons, Markos seemed to have made peace with the fact he wouldn't change his brother's mind...
Key.Chinese: 無論原因為何，Markos 就是改變不了他弟弟的決定，他好像也看開了……
Key.French: Quelles qu'aient été ses raisons, Markos semblait avoir accepté qu'il ne ferait pas changer son frère d'avis.
Key.Spanish: Fuesen cuales fuesen sus razones, parece que Markos ya había aceptado que no haría cambiar de opinión a su hermano...
Key.Italian: Qualsiasi siano le sue ragioni, sembrava che Markos si fosse messo l'anima in pace sul fatto che non avrebbe mai potuto far cambiare idea a suo fratello...
Key.Polish: Niezależnie od tego, co nim kierowało, Markos pogodził się chyba z faktem, że nie przekona brata do zmiany zdania…
Key.Russian: Какими бы ни были причины, похоже, что Маркос смирился с тем фактом, что ему не удастся переубедить своего брата...
Key.German: Welche Gründe er auch gehabt hat: Markos hatte sich damit abgefunden, dass er seinen Bruder nicht umstimmen konnte.
Key.Czech: Ať už byl jeho motiv jakýkoliv, Markos se zřejmě smířil s tím, že názor svého bratra nezmění.
Key.English: Whatever his reasons, Markos seemed to have made peace with the fact he wouldn't change his brother's mind...
Key.Portuguese: Seja lá quais foram as razões dele, parece que o Markos tava em paz com o fato de que não faria o irmão mudar de ideia…
Key.Korean: 이유가 뭐든지 간에 마르코스는 동생의 마음을 꺾을 수 없다는 점을 인정한 것 같더라구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 无论他的原因是什么，Markos 看来接受了他没法改变他兄弟的想法这个现实...
Key.Japanese: 理由がなんであれ、マーコスは兄貴の心は変えられない事を受け入れていたみたいだった…
Key.Turkish: Nedeni her neyse, Markos kardeşinin kararını değiştiremeyeceği gerçeğini kabullenmişti...

Container.name: 005_uxo_disabled
Container.situation: player disables uxo which is blocking the way to a scenario trigger.

Key.Original: You were one sneaky little bastard. Now, what were you hiding upstairs...
Key.Chinese: 你這陰險的小東西。樓上藏了什麼呢……
Key.French: Tu étais une fieffée coquine. Voyons ce que tu gardais, à l'étage.
Key.Spanish: Pero ¿serás desgraciado...? ¿Qué hacías en las escaleras?
Key.Italian: Che piccolo bastardo. Ora vediamo cosa nascondi di sopra…
Key.Polish: Cwana bestia z ciebie. I czego tam na górze pilnowałaś…?
Key.Russian: Ах ты ж подлый маленький ублюдок. И что же ты тут делал наверху...
Key.German: Du ausgefuchster kleiner Bastard … Was hast du oben versteckt?
Key.Czech: Ty jsi mi teda dala zabrat, ty podlá mrcho. Teď se mrknem, co jsi nahoře ukrývala...
Key.English: You were one sneaky little bastard. Now, what were you hiding upstairs...
Key.Portuguese: Você era um negocinho muito do sorrateiro. Beleza, o que você tava escondendo aí em cima…
Key.Korean: 요 도둑놈 같으니. 자, 이제 위층 위에 뭘 숨겼는지...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你这个狡猾的小混蛋。现在，你在楼上藏了什么...
Key.Japanese: 巧妙な野郎だな、こいつめ。さて、上の階に何を隠していたのかな、と…
Key.Turkish: Sinsiydin seni küçük serseri. Şimdi, bakalım yukarıda neler saklıyorsun...

Container.name: 004_eve_mine_disabled
Container.situation: player disables a mine for the first time.

Key.Original: Gotcha.
Key.Chinese: 解決了。
Key.French: Je t'ai eue.
Key.Spanish: Te tengo.
Key.Italian: Fatto.
Key.Polish: Mam cię.
Key.Russian: Порядок.
Key.German: Hab ich dich …
Key.Czech: Mám tě.
Key.English: Gotcha.
Key.Portuguese: Consegui.
Key.Korean: 발견했다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到你了。
Key.Japanese: これでよし。
Key.Turkish: Anladım.

Container.name: 003_ta_toolkit_info
Container.situation: journalist asks the player what he's doing.

Key.Original: Not bad, not bad. Our gear's finally arrived from dispatch.
Key.Chinese: 不錯，不錯。快遞終於把裝備送來了。
Key.French: Pas trop mal. On a enfin reçu notre matériel.
Key.Spanish: Nada mal, nada mal. Por fin nos ha llegado el equipo.
Key.Italian: Non male, non male. Il nostro equipaggiamento ci è finalmente stato consegnato.
Key.Polish: Całkiem nieźle. Wreszcie przysłali nam sprzęt.
Key.Russian: Неплохо, неплохо. Наконец получили наше снаряжение.
Key.German: Nicht schlecht, nicht schlecht. Unsere ausrüstung ist endlich eingetroffen.
Key.Czech: Jde to, jde to. Naše vybavení konečně dorazilo.
Key.English: Not bad, not bad. Our gear's finally arrived from dispatch.
Key.Portuguese: Nada mal, nada mal. Nosso equipamento finalmente chegou da entrega.
Key.Korean: 괜찮아. 나쁘지 않다구. 장비가 드디어 발송되어 도착했거든.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不坏，不坏。我们的装备终于到了。
Key.Japanese: や、悪くない。装備がようやく本部から届いた。
Key.Turkish: Fena değil, fena değil. Donanımımız nihayet sevkiyattan geldi.

Key.Original: I can start deactivating mines and leftover ordnance now.
Key.Chinese: 我可以開始解除地雷和未爆彈了。
Key.French: Je peux commencer à désamorcer les mines et munitions non explosées.
Key.Spanish: Ya puedo empezar a desactivar minas y restos de guerra desperdigados por ahí.
Key.Italian: Adesso posso iniziare a disattivare le mine e gli ordigni rimasti.
Key.Polish: Mogę zacząć rozbrajać miny i niewybuchy.
Key.Russian: Теперь я могу приступить к обезвреживанию мин и неразорвавшихся боеприпасов.
Key.German: Ich kann jetzt mit der Entschärfung der Minen und anderen Kampfmittelrückstände beginnen.
Key.Czech: Můžu se konečně pustit do zneškodňování min a další nevybuchlé munice.
Key.English: I can start deactivating mines and leftover ordnance now.
Key.Portuguese: Já dá pra começar a desativar as minas e os materiais explosivos não detonados.
Key.Korean: 이제 지뢰와 남겨진 병기들을 해체할 수 있어.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我可以开始拆除地雷和遗留的军火了。
Key.Japanese: これで地雷や残った爆弾の解体作業を始められる。
Key.Turkish: Şimdi mayınları ve geride kalan teçhizatı etkisiz hale getirmeye başlayabilirim.

Key.Original: Hey. How you getting on?
Key.Chinese: 嗨。你那邊狀況如何？
Key.French: Hé. Comment ça va chez vous ?
Key.Spanish: Buenas, ¿qué tal te va?
Key.Italian: Ciao. Come te la passi?
Key.Polish: Hej, jak tam?
Key.Russian: Эй. Как у вас дела?
Key.German: Hey, wie läuft's bei Ihnen?
Key.Czech: Ahoj. Jak se daří?
Key.English: Hey. How you getting on?
Key.Portuguese: Ei. Como você tá se saindo?
Key.Korean: 안녕하세요. 잘 되세요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨。情况如何？
Key.Japanese: どうも。状況は如何ですか？
Key.Turkish: Hey. Nasıl gidiyor?

Key.Original: Sure do. I crawl up close, identify it, then just, y'know, disarm the thing.
Key.Chinese: 當然，我爬行接近地雷、辨認種類，然後就，你知道的，把它解除掉。
Key.French: Absolument. Je rampe suffisamment près, j'identifie ce que j'ai et puis je désamorce.
Key.Spanish: Claro. Me agacho y me aproximo, lo identifico y luego desarmo lo que quiera que sea.
Key.Italian: Certo. Ci striscio vicino, li identifico e poi, beh, li disarmo.
Key.Polish: Pewnie. Podczołguję się, rozpoznaję żelastwo i, no wiesz, rozbrajam je.
Key.Russian: Конечно. Я подползаю как можно ближе к мине или снаряду, идентифицирую, а потом обезвреживаю их.
Key.German: Allerdings. Ich krieche ran, identifiziere den Sprengkörper und entschärfe ihn dann.
Key.Czech: No jasně. Připlazím se k mině, omrknu, co je za typ a pak ji prostě zneškodním.
Key.English: Sure do. I crawl up close, identify it, then just, y'know, disarm the thing.
Key.Portuguese: Óbvio. Eu me aproximo engatinhando, identifico e aí é só desarmar a parada.
Key.Korean: 물론이지. 가까이 기어가서 확인한 다음, 알잖나. 지뢰를 해체하는 거지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然要了。我爬到附近，找到它，然后拆雷。
Key.Japanese: もちろん。ゆっくり腹這いで近づいて、その種類を識別すればアッという間に解除の終わり。
Key.Turkish: Tabii ki. Yavaşça yaklaşırım, onu tanımlarım ve sonra, bilirsin, zımbırtıyı etkisiz hale getiririm.

Key.Original: Yeah, well, I may have skipped the part where, y'know, it can explode.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，對，我少說了地雷有可能爆炸那個部分。
Key.French: J'ai sauté le passage qui dit que ça peut exploser.
Key.Spanish: Sí, bueno, quizá haya omitido la parte que... bueno, puede explotar.
Key.Italian: Beh, sì, potrei aver saltato il passaggio in cui, ecco, possono esplodere.
Key.Polish: No, może pominąłem ten szczegół, że w każdej chwili może wybuchnąć.
Key.Russian: Ну, может быть, я упустил ту часть, в которой я подрываюсь на мине.
Key.German: Stimmt, ich habe den Teil ausgelassen, in dem das Ding möglicherweise explodiert.
Key.Czech: No jasně, přeskočil jsem, že ta mina může, no, vybuchnout.
Key.English: Yeah, well, I may have skipped the part where, y'know, it can explode.
Key.Portuguese: É, bom, eu devo ter pulado a parte em que ela pode explodir, sabe.
Key.Korean: 물론. 폭발할 수 있는 부분은 넘길 수도 있구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我也许漏说了，它可能爆炸。
Key.Japanese: まあ、爆発するかもしれないっていう点は言い忘れてたかな。
Key.Turkish: Evet, güzel, bilirsin, patlayabileceğiyle ilgili kısmı kaçırmış olabilirim.

Key.Original: Ah, right. And you do that by hand?
Key.Chinese: 呃，對。一切手動嗎？
Key.French: D'accord. Vous le faites manuellement ?
Key.Spanish: Ah, cierto. ¿Y lo haces a mano?
Key.Italian: Ah, giusto. E lo fai a mano?
Key.Polish: No tak. Robisz to ręcznie?
Key.Russian: Ах, да. Вы делаете это вручную?
Key.German: Verstehe … und machen Sie das von Hand?
Key.Czech: Chápu. A to děláš ručně?
Key.English: Ah, right. And you do that by hand?
Key.Portuguese: Ah, certo. E você faz isso à mão?
Key.Korean: 아, 그러세요. 그런데 손으로 작업하세요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好啊。你要徒手拆雷吗？
Key.Japanese: そうなんですね。その作業って手でやられるんですか？
Key.Turkish: Ah, pekâlâ. Peki bunu elle mi yapacaksın?

Key.Original: I'm sure it's more involved than that.
Key.Chinese: 我覺得好像沒你說的那麼簡單喔。
Key.French: Je suis certaine que c'est un peu plus compliqué que ça.
Key.Spanish: Seguro que no es tan sencillo.
Key.Italian: Sono sicura che sia più complesso di quel che dici.
Key.Polish: To chyba jednak nie jest takie proste.
Key.Russian: Думаю, это на самом деле гораздо сложнее, чем вы описываете.
Key.German: Es ist bestimmt komplizierter als Sie es beschreiben.
Key.Czech: Jsem si jistá, že je to složitější proces.
Key.English: I'm sure it's more involved than that.
Key.Portuguese: Tenho certeza que tem mais coisa envolvida.
Key.Korean: 그게 다는 아닐 것 같은데요.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信没那么简单。
Key.Japanese: 他にも色々やるべきことがあるのでは？
Key.Turkish: Bundan daha uğraştırıcı olduğundan eminim.

Container.name: 002_ta_toolkit_equipped
Container.situation: player picks up the toolkit from a utility drone. the drone flies away.

Key.Original: What's that?
Key.Chinese: 你在說什麼？
Key.French: Qu'est-ce que tu dis ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué es eso?
Key.Italian: Che cosa?
Key.Polish: Co tam?
Key.Russian: Что?
Key.German: Wie war das?
Key.Czech: Co jsi říkal?
Key.English: What's that?
Key.Portuguese: O que foi isso?
Key.Korean: 그게 뭔가?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是什么？
Key.Japanese: なんか言ったか？
Key.Turkish: Bu da ne?

Key.Original: Okay, little buddy. Sure thing.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，小傢伙。當然囉。
Key.French: Très bien, l'ami. Je comprends.
Key.Spanish: Vale, coleguita. Por supuesto.
Key.Italian: Okay, piccoletto. Sicuro.
Key.Polish: Jasne, maluchu, się wie.
Key.Russian: Хорошо, малыш. Как скажешь.
Key.German: Okay, Freundchen. Schon klar.
Key.Czech: Jasný, kamarádíčku. Chápu.
Key.English: Okay, little buddy. Sure thing.
Key.Portuguese: Ok, camaradinha. Pode crer.
Key.Korean: 좋았어. 친구. 그럼.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，小家伙。当然了。
Key.Japanese: わかったよ、「相棒」。まあいいって事よ。
Key.Turkish: Tamam, küçük dostum. Elbette.

Key.Original: Good. Toolkit's here.
Key.Chinese: 很好。工具包有了。
Key.French: Bien. J'ai la trousse à outils.
Key.Spanish: Bien. El juego de herramientas está aquí.
Key.Italian: Bene. Il kit di utensili è arrivato.
Key.Polish: Dobra, są narzędzia.
Key.Russian: Отлично. Инструмент прибыл.
Key.German: Gut, der Werkzeugkasten ist da.
Key.Czech: Skvělé. Přivezli odminovací soupravu.
Key.English: Good. Toolkit's here.
Key.Portuguese: Bom. O kit de ferramentas tá aqui.
Key.Korean: 자네. 자, 도구모음.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好啊。工具包在这。
Key.Japanese: よし。ツールキットがあった。
Key.Turkish: Güzel. Araç takımı burada.

Key.Original: See you later, little buddy.
Key.Chinese: 晚點見，小傢伙。
Key.French: À plus tard, l'ami.
Key.Spanish: Nos vemos luego, renacuajo.
Key.Italian: Ci vediamo dopo, piccoletto.
Key.Polish: Na razie, maluchu.
Key.Russian: Увидимся позже, малыш.
Key.German: Bis später, Freundchen.
Key.Czech: Tak se měj, kamarádíčku.
Key.English: See you later, little buddy.
Key.Portuguese: Até mais tarde, camaradinha.
Key.Korean: 나중에 보자구. 친구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头见，小家伙。
Key.Japanese: じゃあまたな、相棒。
Key.Turkish: Sonra görüşürüz, küçük dostum.

Key.Original: Nothing. Just, um, talking to myself.
Key.Chinese: 沒事。我只是，呃，自言自語。
Key.French: Rien. Je... Je parlais tout seul.
Key.Spanish: Nada. Estaba pensando en alto.
Key.Italian: Niente. Stavo, uhm, solo parlando tra me e me.
Key.Polish: A nic. Tak tylko gadam do siebie.
Key.Russian: Ничего. Просто разговариваю сам с собой.
Key.German: Nichts … ich hab mit mir selbst geredet.
Key.Czech: Ale, to nic. Jenom si tak mluvím sám pro sebe.
Key.English: Nothing. Just, um, talking to myself.
Key.Portuguese: Nada. Eu, uhn, só tô falando sozinho.
Key.Korean: 아니야. 그냥 혼잣말일세.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没事。我只是，呃，自言自语。
Key.Japanese: 何でもない。その、独り言だ。
Key.Turkish: Hiçbir şey. Sadece, ee, kendi kendime konuşuyordum.

Container.name: 001_ta_post_cluster
Container.situation: player returns from a memory to the town in the present.

Key.Original: Hear that...? Sounds like our delivery drone.
Key.Chinese: 那聲音是……？好像是我們的輸送無人機。
Key.French: Tu entends ça ? On dirait notre drone de livraison.
Key.Spanish: ¿Oyes eso?... Parece el dron de entrega.
Key.Italian: Hai sentito…? Sembra il rumore del nostro drone delle consegne.
Key.Polish: Słyszysz…? To chyba nasz dron dostawczy.
Key.Russian: Ты слышишь это...? Похоже на наш дрон.
Key.German: Hörst du das? Das hört sich nach unserer Lieferdrohne an.
Key.Czech: Slyšíš to? To zní jako náš nákladní dron.
Key.English: Hear that...? Sounds like our delivery drone.
Key.Portuguese: Ouviu isso…? Parece o nosso drone de entrega.
Key.Korean: 저 소리 들리나...? 우리팀 수송용 드론 같은데.
Key.Chinesesimp: 听到那声音了吗？听起来象是我们的货运无人机。
Key.Japanese: おい、聞こえるか？うちの輸送ドローンの音みたいだな。
Key.Turkish: Bunu duydun mu...? Teslimat dronumuza benziyor.

Key.Original: Just, uh, check the box underneath for the toolkit.
Key.Chinese: 你、你找下面那個盒子看看，工具包應該在那。
Key.French: Vérifie si la trousse à outils est bien dans la caisse, en dessous.
Key.Spanish: Eh... Echa un vistazo a la caja para encontrar el juego de herramientas.
Key.Italian: Uh, controlla la cassa al di sotto per vedere se c'è il kit di utensilii.
Key.Polish: Może… zobacz, czy w tym jego pudełku nie ma narzędzi.
Key.Russian: Проверь коробку внизу, там должны быть инструменты.
Key.German: Sieh einfach in der unteren Box nach dem Werkzeugkasten.
Key.Czech: Prostě se mrkni, jestli nenese odminovací soupravu.
Key.English: Just, uh, check the box underneath for the toolkit.
Key.Portuguese: Só, uh, confere a caixa debaixo do kit de ferramentas.
Key.Korean: 도구모음 아래 있는 상자를 확인해봐.
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，去下面的箱子里找找工具包。
Key.Japanese: えーと、ツールキットは下の箱の中を見てみてくれ。
Key.Turkish: Şey, ee, araç takımı için kutunun altına bak.

Key.Original: That was one time! Trust me, you'll be dicking around with landmines soon enough, Mac.
Key.Chinese: 就發生那一次而已！相信我，你馬上就能出發掃雷了，Mac。
Key.French: C'est arrivé qu'une seule fois ! T'inquiète, tu pourras bientôt faire mumuse avec tes mines, Mac.
Key.Spanish: ¡Solo fue una vez! En serio, Mac, dentro de nada estarás por ahí rodeado de minas terrestres.
Key.Italian: È successo solo una volta! Stammi a sentire Mac, fra non poco potrai tornare a cazzeggiare con le mine.
Key.Polish: Raz się zdarzyło! Zaufaj mi, Mac, zaraz będziesz sobie majstrował przy minach.
Key.Russian: Это было всего один раз! Не бойся, Мак, у тебя будет еще куча времени повозиться с минами.
Key.German: Das ist nur ein Mal passiert! Vertrau mir: Du wirst noch schnell genug an den Minen herumbasteln, Mac.
Key.Czech: Stalo se to jednou! Věř mi, Macu, s minama si užiješ dost srandy co nevidět.
Key.English: That was one time! Trust me, you'll be dicking around with landmines soon enough, Mac.
Key.Portuguese: Foi uma vez só! Vai por mim, logo você vai estar se divertindo com minas terrestres, Mac.
Key.Korean: 한번이면 족하네! 나만 믿으라고. 곧 지뢰들을 파내게 될 테니까 맥.
Key.Chinesesimp: 就那么一次！相信我，你很快就能找地雷去了，Mac。
Key.Japanese: 忘れたのは一回だけだろ！大丈夫だ、マック。じきに地雷をかちゃかちゃイジれるはずだ。
Key.Turkish: O bir sefer olur! Güven bana, yakında kara mayınlarıyla boş boş takılacaksın, Mac.

Key.Original: I'm on it.
Key.Chinese: 我立刻處理。
Key.French: Je m'en occupe.
Key.Spanish: Estoy en ello.
Key.Italian: Me ne occupo io.
Key.Polish: Robi się.
Key.Russian: Я проверю.
Key.German: Ich mach mich auf den Weg.
Key.Czech: Jdu na to.
Key.English: I'm on it.
Key.Portuguese: Deixa comigo!
Key.Korean: 어 듣고 있어.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这就去。
Key.Japanese: 確認する。
Key.Turkish: İlgileniyorum.

Key.Original: I swear to god, Andy, if it's empty again...
Key.Chinese: Andy，我向老天發誓，如果裡面又是空的……
Key.French: Andy, je te jure que si elle est encore vide...
Key.Spanish: Te lo juro, Andy, como no haya nada...
Key.Italian: Andy, giuro che se è di nuovo vuoto…
Key.Polish: Przysięgam, Andy, że jeśli znowu jest puste…
Key.Russian: Я прокляну бога, Энди, если там опять пусто...
Key.German: Ich schwöre bei Gott, Andy, wenn das Ding wieder leer ist …
Key.Czech: Přísahám bohu, Andy, jestli bude zase prázdnej...
Key.English: I swear to god, Andy, if it's empty again...
Key.Portuguese: Juro por Deus, Andy, se estiver vazio de novo…
Key.Korean: 앤디 신께 맹세컨데, 또 비었기만 해봐...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我向上帝发发誓，Andy，如果它又是空的...
Key.Japanese: アンディ、もしまた空っぽだったら…
Key.Turkish: Andy, yemin ederim, eğer yeniden boşsa...

Container.name: 025_loc_on_foot_cleared
Container.situation: player approaches the minefield on foot after it has been cleared.

Key.Original: Mac, where're you at?
Key.Chinese: Mac，你在哪裡？
Key.French: Mac, tu es où ?
Key.Spanish: Mac, ¿dónde estás?
Key.Italian: Mac, dove sei?
Key.Polish: Mac, gdzie jesteś?
Key.Russian: Мак, ты где?
Key.German: Mac, wo bist du?
Key.Czech: Macu, kde jsi?
Key.English: Mac, where're you at?
Key.Portuguese: Mac, cadê você?
Key.Korean: 맥. 어디 있어?
Key.Chinesesimp: Mac，你在哪？
Key.Japanese: マック、どこ行ったんだ？
Key.Turkish: Mac, neredesin?

Key.Original: Don't make me call your wife, man...
Key.Chinese: 別逼我通知你老婆喔，老兄……
Key.French: J'ai pas envie d'annoncer de mauvaise nouvelle à ta femme...
Key.Spanish: No me obligues a llamar a tu mujer, anda...
Key.Italian: Non costringermi a chiamare tua moglie, amico…
Key.Polish: Tylko żebym nie musiał potem dzwonić do twojej żony…
Key.Russian: Не заставляй меня звонить твоей жене...
Key.German: Zwing mich nicht, deine Frau anzurufen …
Key.Czech: Doufám, že nebudu muset volat tvé ženě, že jsi to koupil, chlape...
Key.English: Don't make me call your wife, man...
Key.Portuguese: Não faz eu ligar pra sua mulher, cara…
Key.Korean: 확 그냥 마누라한테 전화 걸어버려. 자식...
Key.Chinesesimp: 别让我给你妻子打电话，伙计...
Key.Japanese: おい、俺にアンタの奥さんに電話させるなよ…
Key.Turkish: Bana karına telefon ettirme, dostum...

Key.Original: Western minefield... I'm going for a walk - double check we got them all.
Key.Chinese: 我在西邊的地雷區……我要去走一圈，確認都掃乾淨了。
Key.French: Dans le champ de mines ouest. Pour vérifier qu'on les a toutes eues.
Key.Spanish: Campo de minas occidental. Voy a dar un paseo para asegurarme de que no queda nada.
Key.Italian: Sono nel campo minato occidentale… vado a farmi un giro, controllo che le abbiamo trovate tutte.
Key.Polish: Na zachodnim polu minowym… Przejdę się, sprawdzę, czy nic nie pominęliśmy.
Key.Russian: Я на западном минном поле... Хочу прогуляться и убедиться, что мы нашли все мины.
Key.German: Westliches Minenfeld … Ich mache einen Spaziergang und gehe sicher, dass wir alle erwischt haben.
Key.Czech: Na západním minovým poli. Jdu ho ještě jednou projít a ujistit se, že jsme zneškodnili všechny ty miny.
Key.English: Western minefield... I'm going for a walk - double check we got them all.
Key.Portuguese: Campo minado ocidental… Vou dar uma volta. Confere se a gente pegou tudo.
Key.Korean: 서부 지뢰지대야... 잠시 나와봤어. 지뢰가 더 있는지 말이야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 西边的雷区...我去走一趟 - 再确认一次我们已经找到所有地雷了。
Key.Japanese: 西の地雷原だ…ちょっと歩いてくる。全部除去できたか調べてみる。
Key.Turkish: Mayınlı alanın batısı... Yürüyüşe çıkıyorum, hepsini halledip halletmediğimizi tekrar kontrol edeceğim.

Container.name: 024_ex_on_foot_not_cleared
Container.situation: player decides to approach the minefield on foot before it has been cleared.

Key.Original: Depends on how you measure it, buddy.
Key.Chinese: 老兄，那要看你以哪個部位為準。
Key.French: Ça dépend ce que tu mesures, mon pote.
Key.Spanish: Depende de cómo lo midas, amigo.
Key.Italian: Dipende da come lo misuri, amico.
Key.Polish: Zależy, co będziemy mierzyć, stary.
Key.Russian: Смотря как измерять, дружище.
Key.German: Kommt drauf an, wie du es messen möchtest, Kumpel.
Key.Czech: Záleží, co myslíš tím „jak daleko bych se dostal“.
Key.English: Depends on how you measure it, buddy.
Key.Portuguese: Depende de como você mede, cara.
Key.Korean: 어떻게 재느야에 달렸어. 친구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 取决于你怎么衡量它，兄弟。
Key.Japanese: 測り方に因るんじゃないかな。
Key.Turkish: Nasıl ölçtüğüne göre değişir, dostum.

Key.Original: Biggest lump of meat? Or the piece that lands the furthest away?
Key.Chinese: 是最大那塊？還是飛得最遠的那塊？
Key.French: Le plus gros bout de viande ? Ou bien le morceau qui a atterri le plus loin ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué cuenta? ¿El tropezón de carne más grande o al trozo que aterriza más lejos?
Key.Italian: Con il pezzo di carne più grosso? O il pezzo che atterra più lontano?
Key.Polish: Największy strzęp mięsa czy ten, który doleci najdalej?
Key.Russian: По самому крупному куску мяса? Или по тому куску, который дальше всех улетит?
Key.German: Geht es um den größten Fleischbrocken oder das Stück, das am weitesten fliegt?
Key.Czech: Jak daleko by se dostal největší kus tvýho těla? Nebo by se spíš počítal kus tvýho těla, který by dopadl nejdál?
Key.English: Biggest lump of meat? Or the piece that lands the furthest away?
Key.Portuguese: O maior pedaço de carne? Ou a peça que aterrissa mais longe?
Key.Korean: 커다란 고깃덩이 만큼? 아님 땅덩이 크기 만큼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 最大块的肉？还是落在最远处的碎块？
Key.Japanese: 一番大きな肉塊の落ちた場所か？それとも一番遠くまで飛んでった破片の落下地点か？
Key.Turkish: En büyük et parçası mı? Yoksa en uzağa konacak parça mı?

Key.Original: Hey. This minefield. How far d'you think I'd get if I ran straight through the middle of it?
Key.Chinese: 嗨。以這個地雷區來說，如果我直接從中間跑過去，你覺得我最遠能到哪裡？
Key.French: Hé. Tu penses que j'irais loin, si je courais au milieu du champ de mines ?
Key.Spanish: Eh, este campo de minas... ¿Cómo de lejos crees que llegaría si corriese directamente por en medio?
Key.Italian: Ehi, riguardo a questo campo minato: quanto lontano pensi che riesca ad arrivare se lo attraversassi direttamente?
Key.Polish: Hej, jak myślisz, jak daleko dotrę, jeśli rzucę się biegiem przez to pole minowe?
Key.Russian: Эй. Как думаешь, как далеко мне удастся добежать, если я пробегу прямо посередине этого минного поля?
Key.German: Hey, sieh dir das Minenfeld an. Was glaubst du, wie meine Chancen stünden, wenn ich einfach geradeaus durchlaufen würde?
Key.Czech: Hej. Vidíš to minový pole? Co myslíš, jak daleko bych se dostal, kdybych se rozhodl skrz něj jen tak proběhnout?
Key.English: Hey. This minefield. How far d'you think I'd get if I ran straight through the middle of it?
Key.Portuguese: Ei. Esse campo minado. Até onde você acha que eu chegava se corresse reto pelo meio dele?
Key.Korean: 이봐. 이쪽 지뢰지대 말야. 중간 기점으로 직진해서 통과한다면 크기가 얼마나 될까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。这个雷区。如果我从中间直直穿过，你觉得我能跑多远？
Key.Japanese: なあ。この地雷原、ど真ん中を全力で走ったらどこまで行けると思う？
Key.Turkish: Hey. Bu mayınlı alan. Ortasından koşarsam ne kadar gidebilirim sence?

Container.name: 023_loc_castle_enter
Container.situation: player flies the drone above the castle. this may or may not occur and depends on player's actions.

Key.Original: Yeah. Lotta guerrillas lost their lives down there.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。很多游擊軍死在這裡。
Key.French: Oui. Beaucoup d'insurgés y ont perdu la vie.
Key.Spanish: Sí, un montón de guerrilleros perdieron la vida aquí.
Key.Italian: Eh sì. Molti guerriglieri persero la vita qui.
Key.Polish: Taa, wielu partyzantów dokonało tam żywota.
Key.Russian: Да. Много партизан здесь полегло.
Key.German: Ja, viele Guerillas haben da unten ihr Leben verloren.
Key.Czech: Jo. Hodně partyzánů to tady koupilo.
Key.English: Yeah. Lotta guerrillas lost their lives down there.
Key.Portuguese: É. Vários guerrilheiros perderam a vida por lá.
Key.Korean: 그래. 게릴라놈들이 그곳에서 수 없이 죽어나갔지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。很多游击队员在那儿丧生。
Key.Japanese: ああ。そっちじゃゲリラが大勢死んだからな。
Key.Turkish: Evet. Bir sürü gerilla burada hayatını kaybetti.

Key.Original: Castle looks empty.
Key.Chinese: 城堡空蕩蕩的。
Key.French: Le château a l'air abandonné.
Key.Spanish: El castillo parece vacío.
Key.Italian: Il castello sembra vuoto.
Key.Polish: Zamek wygląda na pusty.
Key.Russian: Замок выглядит заброшенным.
Key.German: Die Burg sieht leer aus.
Key.Czech: Hrad vypadá opuštěný.
Key.English: Castle looks empty.
Key.Portuguese: Parece que o castelo tá vazio.
Key.Korean: 성은 텅 빈것 같군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 城堡看来是空的。
Key.Japanese: 城には誰も居ないようだ。
Key.Turkish: Kale boş görünüyor.

Key.Original: Right. Night of the cluster strike...
Key.Chinese: 對。集束攻擊那晚……
Key.French: Oui. La frappe à sous-munitions, ce soir-là...
Key.Spanish: Sí, la noche del ataque con bombas de racimo...
Key.Italian: Già. La notte dell'attacco con le bombe a grappolo…
Key.Polish: Tak, w noc nalotów kasetowych…
Key.Russian: Точно. В ночь бомбардировки кассетными боеприпасами...
Key.German: Stimmt, das war die Nacht des Cluster-Angriffs …
Key.Czech: No jo. Té noci, kdy svrhli tu kazetovou pumu...
Key.English: Right. Night of the cluster strike...
Key.Portuguese: Certo. A noite do bombardeio…
Key.Korean: 맞아. 그날 밤 집속탄 타격이...
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。集束炸弹攻击之夜...
Key.Japanese: そうだな。クラスター弾投下の夜か…
Key.Turkish: Doğru. Grup saldırısının gecesi...

Container.name: 022_loc_church_enter
Container.situation: player flies the drone above the church. this may or may not occur and depends on player's actions.

Key.Original: Careful, Mac. Don't piss off the soldiers. They're collecting their dead, remember?
Key.Chinese: 小心點，Mac。別惹火那些士兵。他們是來帶走陣亡弟兄的，記得吧？
Key.French: Attention, Mac. Ne dérange pas les soldats. N'oublie pas qu'ils sont venus chercher leurs morts.
Key.Spanish: Cuidado, Mac. No les toques las pelotas a los soldados. Están recogiendo a los muertos, ¿recuerdas?
Key.Italian: Occhio, Mac. Non far incazzare i soldati. Stanno recuperando i loro caduti, ricordi?
Key.Polish: Ostrożnie, Mac. Nie wkurzaj żołnierzy. Zajmują się poległymi, pamiętasz?
Key.Russian: Осторожнее, Мак. Не беси солдат. Не забывай, что они собирают тела своих товарищей.
Key.German: Vorsicht, Mac. Mach die Soldaten nicht wütend. Sie sammeln ihre Toten ein, vergiss das nicht.
Key.Czech: Bacha, Macu. Nenaser ty vojáky. Přišli si pro své mrtvé, nezapomeň.
Key.English: Careful, Mac. Don't piss off the soldiers. They're collecting their dead, remember?
Key.Portuguese: Cuidado, Mac. Não mexe com os soldados. Eles estão recolhendo os mortos deles, lembra?
Key.Korean: 조심하라구, 맥. 괜히 병사들을 건드리지 말라구. 시체를 수거하는 중이니까. 기억나지?
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心，Mac。别惹恼了士兵。他们在收拾阵亡者遗体，记得吗？
Key.Japanese: 気を付けろよ、マック。兵隊連中を怒らせるな。あっちは死んだ同輩を回収してるんだ。
Key.Turkish: Dikkat et, Mac. Askerleri gıcık etme. Ölülerini topluyorlar, hatırladın mı?

Key.Original: Mm. Gotta pretty decent view of the church up here.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。從這上頭可以清楚看見教會。
Key.French: J'ai une jolie vue sur l'église, d'ici.
Key.Spanish: Sí. Desde aquí arriba se ve muy bien la iglesia.
Key.Italian: Mm. C'è una vista della chiesa niente male da quassù.
Key.Polish: Mam stąd dobry widok na kościół.
Key.Russian: М-м. Отсюда очень неплохой вид на церковь.
Key.German: Mhm. Von hier oben hat man einen guten Blick auf die Kirche.
Key.Czech: Hm. Mám teď solidní výhled na celý kostel.
Key.English: Mm. Gotta pretty decent view of the church up here.
Key.Portuguese: Hmm. Daqui dá pra ter uma visão bem boa da igreja.
Key.Korean: 음. 이곳에서 교회가 아주 멋지게 보이는군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。从这里看去，教堂真漂亮。
Key.Japanese: ふむ。ここからなら教会が良く見える。
Key.Turkish: Hımm. Buradan kilise gayet net görünüyor.

Container.name: 021_eve_building_collapse
Container.situation: cutscene. the guerrilla's one-time armory building collapses. the player is forced out of 'drone view' and there's a loud explosion in the town.

Key.Original: Relax, relax... Sounds like it came from the other side of town.
Key.Chinese: 放輕鬆、別緊張……聲音好像是從城的另一端傳來的。
Key.French: Relax... Ça avait l'air de provenir de l'autre côté du village.
Key.Spanish: Calma, calma... Parece que vino de la otra parte de la ciudad...
Key.Italian: Calmo, calmo... Sembrava arrivasse dall'altra parte della città.
Key.Polish: Spokojnie… To chyba po drugiej stronie miasta.
Key.Russian: Да расслабься ты... Судя по всему, это было на другом конце города.
Key.German: Entspann dich … Das muss vom anderen Ende des Dorfes gekommen sein.
Key.Czech: Buď v klidu. Vypadá to, že to přišlo z druhýho konce města.
Key.English: Relax, relax... Sounds like it came from the other side of town.
Key.Portuguese: Relaxa, relaxa… Parece que veio do outro lado da cidade.
Key.Korean: 워, 진정하라구... 마을의 다른 쪽에서 온 것 같은데.
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松，放松...听起来象是从城镇的另一头传来的。
Key.Japanese: 落ち着け、落ち着け…今の音は町の反対側で起きたみたいだったな。
Key.Turkish: Sakin, sakin... Sanki kasabanın diğer tarafından geldi.

Key.Original: You want me to take a look?
Key.Chinese: 要我過去看看嗎？
Key.French: Tu veux que j'y jette un œil ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Quieres que vaya a echar un vistazo?
Key.Italian: Vuoi che dia un'occhiata?
Key.Polish: Mam sprawdzić?
Key.Russian: Хочешь, чтобы я проверил?
Key.German: Soll ich mal nachsehen?
Key.Czech: Mám se na to mrknout?
Key.English: You want me to take a look?
Key.Portuguese: Quer que eu dê uma olhada?
Key.Korean: 내가 한번 봐줄까?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想让我去看看吗？
Key.Japanese: 俺が見に行ってこようか？
Key.Turkish: Bakmamı ister misin?

Key.Original: What the fuck was that?
Key.Chinese: 他媽的發生什麼事？
Key.French: Bordel, c'était quoi ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué cojones ha sido eso?
Key.Italian: Cosa cazzo è stato?
Key.Polish: Co to, kurwa, było?
Key.Russian: Какого хера? Что это было?
Key.German: Was zum Geier war das?
Key.Czech: Co to kurva bylo?
Key.English: What the fuck was that?
Key.Portuguese: Que porra foi essa?
Key.Korean: 대체 저게 뭐지?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这究竟是怎么回事？
Key.Japanese: おい、今のはなんだ？
Key.Turkish: Bu da neydi böyle?

Key.Original: Loose masonry, maybe? Just happened to disturb a landmine or something?
Key.Chinese: 土石鬆動嗎？然後剛好觸動地雷之類的？
Key.French: Un bâtiment instable, peut-être ? Ça pourrait déclencher une mine...
Key.Spanish: Edificios frágiles, ¿quizá? Quizá algún trozo cayó encima de una mina terrestre o algo así.
Key.Italian: Forse un mattone che cadendo ha attivato una mina terrestre o qualcosa del genere?
Key.Polish: Obluzowany kamień? Może spadł akurat na minę.
Key.Russian: Может дом обвалился и случайно спровоцировал взрыв мины или что-то типа того?
Key.German: Vielleicht loses Mauerwerk? Hab ich vielleicht zufällig eine Landmine ausgelöst?
Key.Czech: Uvolněný zdivo? Budova se zhroutila a asi aktivovala nějakou minu.
Key.English: Loose masonry, maybe? Just happened to disturb a landmine or something?
Key.Portuguese: Alvenaria solta, talvez? Será que foi uma das minas terrestres ou algo assim?
Key.Korean: 벽돌 조각 같은 건가? 지뢰 같은 것을 건드렸어?
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许是坍塌的墙体？正好触发了地雷还是什么的？
Key.Japanese: 緩い石が落ちたとか？それが間違って地雷に当たったとか？
Key.Turkish: Belki gevşek bir duvardır? Bir kara mayınını falan yok ederken olmuştur?

Key.Original: No - no, stay put - I'll go.
Key.Chinese: 不，不用，你留在這，我過去。
Key.French: Non. Ne bouge pas. J'y vais.
Key.Spanish: No, no, quédate aquí; ya voy yo.
Key.Italian: No, no. Rimani qui, ci penso io.
Key.Polish: Nie, nie, zostań. Ja pójdę.
Key.Russian: Нет, оставайся здесь, я сам проверю.
Key.German: Nein, nein, bleib da – ich geh schon.
Key.Czech: Ne, zůstaň tady. Omrknu to sám.
Key.English: No - no, stay put - I'll go.
Key.Portuguese: Não, não, só fica aqui. Eu vou.
Key.Korean: 아니야. 그냥 있어봐. 내가 가볼게.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不 - 不，呆着别动 - 让我去。
Key.Japanese: いや - いい。ここに居てくれ。俺が見に行く。
Key.Turkish: Hayır, hayır, olduğun yerde kal, ben giderim.

Key.Original: Yeah - maybe.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，大概吧。
Key.French: Mouais, peut-être.
Key.Spanish: Sí, quizá...
Key.Italian: Sì, può darsi.
Key.Polish: Tak, może.
Key.Russian: Да, возможно.
Key.German: Ja, vielleicht.
Key.Czech: Jo. Asi.
Key.English: Yeah - maybe.
Key.Portuguese: É, pode ser.
Key.Korean: 어. 아마도.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯 - 也许。
Key.Japanese: ああ、かもしれん。
Key.Turkish: Evet, belki.

Container.name: 020_eve_cleared_all
Container.situation: player clears all landmines in the minefield.

Key.Original: Nice work, Big Mac! Bring it home.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好啊，Mac 老大！大功告成了。
Key.French: Beau boulot, Big Mac ! Ramène-le au bercail.
Key.Spanish: ¡Bien hecho, Big Mac! ¡Volvamos!
Key.Italian: Ottimo lavoro,Big Mac! Dai così.
Key.Polish: Pięknie, Big Mac! Zwijaj się.
Key.Russian: Хорошая работа, Биг Мак! Возвращайся домой.
Key.German: Gute Arbeit, Big Mac! Ab nach Hause.
Key.Czech: Dobrá práce, Big Macu! Tak to má vypadat.
Key.English: Nice work, Big Mac! Bring it home.
Key.Portuguese: Bom trabalho, Big Mac! Pode trazer de volta.
Key.Korean: 훌륭하셔, 맥 형님! 가져오시게나
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，大 Mac！把它带回去。
Key.Japanese: さすがだな、ビッグマック！それじゃあこっちまで戻してくれ。
Key.Turkish: İyi iş çıkardın, Big Mac! Onu eve getir.

Key.Original: Alright. That's it.
Key.Chinese: 好。就是這樣了。
Key.French: OK. C'est bon.
Key.Spanish: Sí, eso es.
Key.Italian: Ecco fatto.
Key.Polish: Dobra, gotowe.
Key.Russian: Так. Это и все.
Key.German: Alles klar, das war's.
Key.Czech: Dobrá. To bychom měli.
Key.English: Alright. That's it.
Key.Portuguese: Certo. É isso aí.
Key.Korean: 좋아. 그게 좋겠지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。就这样了。
Key.Japanese: よし。これで終わりだ。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ. Bu iş bu kadar.

Container.name: 019_eve_cleared_almost_all
Container.situation: player clears almost all of the landmines.

Key.Original: Alright. Almost done.
Key.Chinese: 好。解除得差不多了。
Key.French: OK. J'ai presque terminé.
Key.Spanish: Muy bien, ya casi está.
Key.Italian: Okay. Quasi finito.
Key.Polish: Prawie skończyłem.
Key.Russian: Так. Почти готово.
Key.German: Alles klar, fast geschafft.
Key.Czech: Dobrá. Už to skoro mám.
Key.English: Alright. Almost done.
Key.Portuguese: Certo. Quase pronto.
Key.Korean: 좋아. 거의 다했다구.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。快干完了。
Key.Japanese: さて。あとちょっとだ。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ. Neredeyse bitti.

Container.name: 018_eve_cleared_half
Container.situation: player clears half of the landmines.

Key.Original: How's it going?
Key.Chinese: 狀況如何？
Key.French: Ça se passe comment ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Cómo va?
Key.Italian: Come procede?
Key.Polish: Jak ci idzie?
Key.Russian: Как дела?
Key.German: Wie läuft's?
Key.Czech: Jak to jde?
Key.English: How's it going?
Key.Portuguese: Como tá indo?
Key.Korean: 어떻게 되가나?
Key.Chinesesimp: 情况怎样？
Key.Japanese: 調子の方はどうだ？
Key.Turkish: Nasıl gidiyor?

Key.Original: Getting there.
Key.Chinese: 還在努力。
Key.French: Ça se passe.
Key.Spanish: Falta poco.
Key.Italian: Ci siamo quasi.
Key.Polish: Powoli do przodu.
Key.Russian: На полпути.
Key.German: Bin auf nem guten Weg.
Key.Czech: Dělám na tom.
Key.English: Getting there.
Key.Portuguese: Quase lá.
Key.Korean: 곧 도착하네.
Key.Chinesesimp: 差不多了。
Key.Japanese: 進行中だ。
Key.Turkish: Oraya yaklaşıyorum.

Container.name: 017_eve_cleared_first
Container.situation: player clears first landmine.

Key.Original: Five-hundred grams of Crovex water-gel, baby.
Key.Chinese: 五百克的 Crovex 水膠呀，寶貝。
Key.French: Cinq cents grammes de gel Crovex aqueux, mon pote.
Key.Spanish: 500 gramos de hidrogel Crovex, chaval.
Key.Italian: Cinquecento grammi di esplosivo ad acqua Crovex, dolcezza.
Key.Polish: 500 gramów hydrożelu Crovex.
Key.Russian: Пятьсот граммов геля Crovex, детка.
Key.German: Fünfhundert Gramm Crovex-Wassergel, Baby.
Key.Czech: Půl kila crovexovýho hydrogelu, kámo.
Key.English: Five-hundred grams of Crovex water-gel, baby.
Key.Portuguese: Meio quilo de gel Crovex à base d’água, mano.
Key.Korean: 크로벡스 워터 젤 500그램일세.
Key.Chinesesimp: 五百克 Crovex 水胶炸药，好家伙。
Key.Japanese: クロベックス水溶ジェル 500 グラム分だぜ、ベイベー。
Key.Turkish: Beş yüz gram Crovex su jeli, bebeğim.

Key.Original: These demining charges pack quite a punch - what's in them?
Key.Chinese: 掃雷炸藥包裝得鼓鼓的－－裡面到底有什麼？
Key.French: Ces explosifs de déminage sont surpuissants. C'est quoi ?
Key.Spanish: Esas cargas de desminado son la leche de potentes; ¿qué contienen?
Key.Italian: Queste cariche di sminamento danno proprio una bella botta, che cosa c'è dentro?
Key.Polish: Te ładunki przeciwminowe mają niezłego kopa – co w nich jest?
Key.Russian: Эти снаряды для разминирования достаточно сильные. Что в них?
Key.German: Diese Minenräumungs-Pakete haben ganz schön Wumms. Was ist da drin?
Key.Czech: Tyhle odminovací nálože jsou dost silný. Co v nich je?
Key.English: These demining charges pack quite a punch - what's in them?
Key.Portuguese: Essas cargas de desminagem são bem poderosas. O que tem nelas?
Key.Korean: 이 지뢰제거용 화약은 상당히 강력하지. 안에 뭐가 들었나?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些排雷炸药包挺沉的，里面是什么？
Key.Japanese: この除去用炸薬、かなりの破壊力だな。何が入ってるんだ？
Key.Turkish: Bu mayın temizleme imla haklarının güçlü bir etkisi var; içlerinde ne var?

Container.name: 016_eve_rearm
Container.situation: the drone approaches the rearming area.

Key.Original: There you are. Set it down where you started.
Key.Chinese: 你在這呀。操縱它回來起始點。
Key.French: Ah, te voilà. Atterris où tu as décollé.
Key.Spanish: Ahí estás. Déjalo donde empezaste:
Key.Italian: Eccoti qui. Atterra dove hai iniziato.
Key.Polish: No i proszę. Posadź go tam, gdzie zacząłeś.
Key.Russian: Вот ты где. Посади его там, откуда он взлетал.
Key.German: Da kommt sie. Lande, wo du angefangen hast.
Key.Czech: Tady tě máme. Přistaň s ním tam, kde jsi začal.
Key.English: There you are. Set it down where you started.
Key.Portuguese: Tá aí. Bota onde você começou.
Key.Korean: 왔어. 시작한 곳이 어디야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在这啊。把它放在你开始的那个地方。
Key.Japanese: 見えたな。離陸した場所に着地させてくれ。
Key.Turkish: İşte oradasın. Onu başladığı yere geri koymuşsun.

Key.Original: Over by those white containers.
Key.Chinese: 白色貨櫃箱那邊。
Key.French: Près de ces caisses blanches.
Key.Spanish: en esos contenedores blancos.
Key.Italian: Accanto a quelle casse bianche.
Key.Polish: Przy tych białych pojemnikach.
Key.Russian: Рядом с вон теми белыми контейнерами.
Key.German: Da drüben bei den weißen Containern.
Key.Czech: Tam u těch bílých beden.
Key.English: Over by those white containers.
Key.Portuguese: Lá perto daqueles recipientes brancos.
Key.Korean: 이 배색 용기 위.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那些白色容器旁边。
Key.Japanese: あの白色のコンテナのところだ。
Key.Turkish: Şu beyaz konteynerlerin üstünde.

Container.name: 015_ex_out_of_ammo_3
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo again. the driver is surprised by the amount of bombs the eod is using.

Key.Original: Seriously? Nathanial Francis MacDade, how big is this minefield...?
Key.Chinese: 你認真的？Nathanial Francis MacDade，這地雷區有大到要用那麼多炸藥……？
Key.French: Sérieux ? Nathanial Francis MacDade, quelle taille fait ton champ de mines ?
Key.Spanish: ¿En serio? Nathanial Francis MacDade, ¿cómo de grande es este campo de minas?...
Key.Italian: Ma seriamente? Nathanial Francis MacDade, quanto è grande questo campo minato…?
Key.Polish: Serio? Nathanialu Francisie MacDade, gdzie się kończy to pole minowe…?
Key.Russian: Серьезно? Натаниель Фрэнсис Макдейд, каких размеров это минное поле...?
Key.German: Ist das dein Ernst, Nathaniel Francis MaxDade? Wie groß ist dieses Minenfeld?
Key.Czech: Neuvěřitelné. Nathaniele Francisi MacDade, jak velký je vlastně tohle minový pole?
Key.English: Seriously? Nathanial Francis MacDade, how big is this minefield...?
Key.Portuguese: Sério? Nathanial Francis MacDade, qual o tamanho desse campo minado…?
Key.Korean: 진짜? 나다니엘 프란시스 맥데이드, 이 지뢰지대는 얼마나 큰거야...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 说真的吗？Nathanial Francis MacDade，这个雷区有多大...？
Key.Japanese: おい本気か？ナサニエル・フランシス・マクデイド、この地雷原はそんなにデカいのか？
Key.Turkish: Ciddi misin? Nathanial Francis MacDade, bu mayınlı alan ne kadar büyük ki...?

Key.Original: Sure thing, Franny Mac. Anyway, you know the drill. Send it back for resupply.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，Franny Mac。總之，你知道怎麼做。讓它回來補充炸藥包。
Key.French: OK, Franny Mac. Bon, tu connais la chanson. Ramène ton drone pour le ravitailler.
Key.Spanish: Claro, Franny Mac. Bueno, ya sabes cómo va esto. Envíalo de vuelta para que se reabastezca.
Key.Italian: Certo, Franny Mac. Comunque, sai cosa devi fare. Rimandalo indietro per fare rifornimento.
Key.Polish: Jasna sprawa, Franny Mac. Wiesz, jak to leci. Wyślij go po uzupełnienie.
Key.Russian: Как скажешь, Фрэнни Мак. Как бы там ни было, ты знаешь, что делать. Отправь его на перезарядку.
Key.German: Schon klar, Franny Mac. Du weißt ja, wie das läuft. Schick sie zurück, um sie aufzurüsten.
Key.Czech: Jasný, máti Franny Macová. Ale vážně, víš, co máš dělat. Pošli drona pro další nálože.
Key.English: Sure thing, Franny Mac. Anyway, you know the drill. Send it back for resupply.
Key.Portuguese: Claro, Franny Mac. Enfim, já sabe como funciona. Manda de volta pra reabastecer.
Key.Korean: 물론이지, 프래니 맥. 아무튼. 방법을 잘 알고 있겠지. 재보급을 위해 후송해라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，Franny Mac。无论如何，你知道怎么做。把它送回去补充装备。
Key.Japanese: まあ心配するな、フラニー・マックよ。やり方は今まで通り。こっちへ戻して補給だ。
Key.Turkish: Elbette, Franny Mac. Her neyse, nasıl yapılacağını biliyorsun. Yeniden ikmal için onu geri gönder.

Key.Original: Only my mom calls me Francis, Andy.
Key.Chinese: Andy，只有我老媽才會那樣喊我。
Key.French: Il n'y a que ma mère qui m'appelle Francis.
Key.Spanish: Andy, solo mi madre me llama Francis.
Key.Italian: Andy, solo mia madre mi chiama Francis.
Key.Polish: Tylko mama nazywa mnie Francis, Andy.
Key.Russian: Только мама называет меня Фрэнсис, Энди.
Key.German: Nur meine Mutter nennt mich Francis, Andy.
Key.Czech: Jenom moje matka mi říká Francisi.
Key.English: Only my mom calls me Francis, Andy.
Key.Portuguese: Só minha mãe me chama de Francis, Andy.
Key.Korean: 나를 프란시스라고 부르는 사람은 어머님 뿐이라고, 앤디.
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有我妈妈叫我 Francis，Andy。
Key.Japanese: アンディ、俺をフランシスって呼ぶのはうちのお袋だけだぞ。
Key.Turkish: Bana yalnızca annem Francis der, Andy.

Container.name: 014_ex_out_of_ammo_2
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo again.

Key.Original: No problem, Mac. Same deal.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，Mac。按之前的方法補充吧。
Key.French: Aucun problème, Mac. Même manœuvre.
Key.Spanish: No pasa nada, Mac. Lo mismo de antes.
Key.Italian: Nessun problema, Mac. Stesso schema.
Key.Polish: Nie ma sprawy, Mac. Załatwimy to.
Key.Russian: Без проблем, Мак. Ты знаешь, что надо делать.
Key.German: Kein Problem, Mac. Das macht keinen Unterschied.
Key.Czech: Jasný, Macu. Stejnej postup jako předtím.
Key.English: No problem, Mac. Same deal.
Key.Portuguese: Sem problema, Mac. Mesmo esquema.
Key.Korean: 문제 없어, 맥. 똑같이 하면 돼.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题，Mac。同样的事情。
Key.Japanese: いいぞ、マック。さっきと同じ要領だ。
Key.Turkish: Sorun değil, Mac. Öncekinin aynısı.

Key.Original: Gonna need another resupply.
Key.Chinese: 我要再補充一次炸藥包。
Key.French: Je dois encore refaire le plein.
Key.Spanish: Hay que reabastecerlo de nuevo.
Key.Italian: Ho bisogno di altre munizioni.
Key.Polish: Znów potrzebuję zaopatrzenia.
Key.Russian: Мне нужны еще боеприпасы.
Key.German: Ich wird Nachschub brauchen.
Key.Czech: Budu potřebovat doplnit nálože.
Key.English: Gonna need another resupply.
Key.Portuguese: Vou precisar reabastecer de novo.
Key.Korean: 재보급이 또 필요할 거아.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还需要补充一次装备。
Key.Japanese: もう一度補給を頼む。
Key.Turkish: Yeniden ikmale ihtiyaç olacak.

Container.name: 013_ex_out_of_ammo_1
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo for the first time.

Key.Original: Don't sweat it. Steer back on over to the van. I'll rearm you.
Key.Chinese: 這簡單。讓它回來廂型車這邊。我來幫它補充。
Key.French: Aucun problème. Vole jusqu'à la camionnette. Je vais faire le plein.
Key.Spanish: No te preocupes. Ve hacia la furgoneta, ahí lo reabasteceremos.
Key.Italian: Non preoccuparti. Vola verso il furgone. Ti riarmeremo.
Key.Polish: Luzik. Wróć nim do furgonetki, uzupełnimy.
Key.Russian: Не волнуйся. Посади его на фургон. Мы пополним боекомплект.
Key.German: Keine Sorge, flieg einfach rüber zum Transporter und wir laden sie nach.
Key.Czech: Nelam si s tím hlavu. Přileť s tím dronem sem k dodávce. Doplníme mu nálože.
Key.English: Don't sweat it. Steer back on over to the van. I'll rearm you.
Key.Portuguese: Não se preocupa com isso. Manda de volta pra camionete. A gente vai te rearmar.
Key.Korean: 너무 속태우지 말게. 밴으로 돌아가게. 거기서 재무장해줄 거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 别着急。回到面包车这来。我们会给你补充装备。
Key.Japanese: 心配するな。バンの方へ戻せ。補給し直す。
Key.Turkish: Onu terletme. Panelvana yönlendir. Seni yeniden silahlandıracağız.

Key.Original: I'm out.
Key.Chinese: 炸藥用完了。
Key.French: Je suis à sec.
Key.Spanish: No me queda munición.
Key.Italian: Munizioni finite.
Key.Polish: Bomby się skończyły.
Key.Russian: Кончились боеприпасы.
Key.German: Munition ist alle.
Key.Czech: Došly mi nálože.
Key.English: I'm out.
Key.Portuguese: Tô fora.
Key.Korean: 그럼 난 가겠네.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的装备用完了。
Key.Japanese: 炸薬が切れた。
Key.Turkish: Mühimmatım bitti.

Container.name: 012_eve_drone_fired
Container.situation: the drone drops a demining bomb for the first time.

Key.Original: Having fun there?
Key.Chinese: 玩得開心嗎？
Key.French: Tu t'amuses bien ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Qué tal? ¿Divertido?
Key.Italian: Ti stai divertendo?
Key.Polish: Dobrze się tam bawisz?
Key.Russian: Веселишься там?
Key.German: Hast du Spaß da draußen?
Key.Czech: Je to zábava, co?
Key.English: Having fun there?
Key.Portuguese: Tá se divertindo aí?
Key.Korean: 거기는 재미 좋은가?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿好玩吗？
Key.Japanese: よお、楽しんでるかい？
Key.Turkish: Orada eğleniyor musun?

Key.Original: Making things go boom? You know it!
Key.Chinese: 你是指炸掉東西？那當然！
Key.French: À faire péter des trucs ? À ton avis ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Te gusta hacer que las cosas exploten? ¡Eso es!
Key.Italian: A far esplodere le cose? Lo sai bene!
Key.Polish: Przy robieniu „bum”? Jasna sprawa!
Key.Russian: Ага, взрываю всякие штуки. Ну ты знаешь.
Key.German: Ich lasse Dinge explodieren, was denkst du denn?
Key.Czech: Sledovat, jak věci vybuchujou. No nemám pravdu?
Key.English: Making things go boom? You know it!
Key.Portuguese: Fazendo as coisas explodirem? Pode crer!
Key.Korean: 일이 치는 거 말인가? 알면서!
Key.Chinesesimp: 让东西爆炸？你知道那是怎么回事！
Key.Japanese: 物をドカーンと爆発させてるんだぞ。答えは決まってる！
Key.Turkish: Bunu patlatırken mi? Biliyorsun!

Container.name: 011_ex_all_drones_crashed
Container.situation: player crashes the second drone. the mission fails.

Key.Original: Yes, Nathan?
Key.Chinese: 欸，Nathan？
Key.French: Oui, Nathan ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Sí, Nathan?
Key.Italian: Sì, Nathan?
Key.Polish: Tak, Nathanie?
Key.Russian: Да, Натан?
Key.German: Ja, Nathan?
Key.Czech: Ano, Nathane?
Key.English: Yes, Nathan?
Key.Portuguese: Fala, Nathan?
Key.Korean: 그렇지, 네이선?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么事，Nathan？
Key.Japanese: どうしたネイサン。
Key.Turkish: Evet, Nathan?

Key.Original: Um, Andy?
Key.Chinese: 嗯，Andy？
Key.French: Euh, Andy ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Andy?
Key.Italian: Uhm, Andy?
Key.Polish: Yyy, Andy?
Key.Russian: Эм, Энди?
Key.German: Ähm, Andy?
Key.Czech: …Andy?
Key.English: Um, Andy?
Key.Portuguese: Uhn, Andy?
Key.Korean: 흠. 앤디?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，Andy？
Key.Japanese: えーと、アンディ？
Key.Turkish: Ee, Andy?

Key.Original: Um, never mind...
Key.Chinese: 呃，沒事……
Key.French: Euh, non, rien.
Key.Spanish: Ah, nada...
Key.Italian: Uhm, niente…
Key.Polish: Eee, nieważne…
Key.Russian: Ладно, не переживай...
Key.German: Ähm, schon gut …
Key.Czech: Ále, radši nic.
Key.English: Um, never mind...
Key.Portuguese: Uhn, deixa pra lá…
Key.Korean: 흠. 별거 아니네...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，没事...
Key.Japanese: いや、何でもない…
Key.Turkish: Ee, neyse boş ver...

Container.name: 010_ex_drone_crashed
Container.situation: player crashes the first drone.

Key.Original: Sweet lord, give me patience.
Key.Chinese: 天老爺，求你賜我耐性……
Key.French: Seigneur, donne-moi ta patience.
Key.Spanish: Señor, dame paciencia...
Key.Italian: Signore, dammi la pazienza.
Key.Polish: Słodki Jezu, daj mi cierpliwość.
Key.Russian: Господи, дай мне терпения.
Key.German: Gott, schenk mir Geduld.
Key.Czech: Pane bože, co jsem komu udělal.
Key.English: Sweet lord, give me patience.
Key.Portuguese: Meu pai do céu, dai-me paciência.
Key.Korean: 좀 기다려주시죠.
Key.Chinesesimp: 亲爱的上帝，赐给我耐性吧。
Key.Japanese: 神よ、俺に忍耐の心を授けてくれ。
Key.Turkish: Tanrım, bana sabır ver.

Key.Original: Alright. Let's use the other one - maybe we can say it malfunctioned.
Key.Chinese: 好。改用另一個吧，我們可以說它故障了。
Key.French: OK. Utilisons l'autre. On dira que celui-là est tombé en panne.
Key.Spanish: Muy bien, usemos el otro. Quizá cuela si decimos que este estaba escacharrado.
Key.Italian: Okay, usiamo l'altro. Possiamo dire che c'è stato un malfunzionamento.
Key.Polish: Dobra. Użyjmy drugiego. Możemy naściemniać, że się zepsuł.
Key.Russian: Так. Давай использовать другой, скажем, что этот сломался.
Key.German: Alles klar, lass uns die andere Benutzen. Wir können ja so tun, als hätte sie eine Fehlfunktion gehabt.
Key.Czech: Dobrá. Použijem druhýho drona. Pak řeknem, že se ten první porouchal.
Key.English: Alright. Let's use the other one - maybe we can say it malfunctioned.
Key.Portuguese: Beleza. Vamos usar o outro, talvez a gente consiga dizer que deu problema.
Key.Korean: 알았어. 다른 거 사용하면 돼. 기계가 오작동됐다고 하면 될거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。我们用另一架 - 也许我们可以说它失灵了。
Key.Japanese: よし。もう 1 機を使おう。最初のは故障したとでも言えばいい。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ. Diğerini kullanalım, belki onun arızalandığını söyleyebiliriz.

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。
Key.French: Merde.
Key.Spanish: Mierda.
Key.Italian: Merda.
Key.Polish: Cholera.
Key.Russian: Дерьмо.
Key.German: Scheiße.
Key.Czech: Do hajzlu.
Key.English: Shit.
Key.Portuguese: Merda.
Key.Korean: 제기랄.
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。
Key.Japanese: やばい。
Key.Turkish: Lanet.

Key.Original: I, uh... yeah. I think I just totaled our drone.
Key.Chinese: 我，呃……對。我剛毀了無人機。
Key.French: J'ai... Je viens de détruire le drone.
Key.Spanish: Esto... eh... Creo que he acabado con nuestro dron.
Key.Italian: Uh, ecco... credo di aver distrutto il nostro drone.
Key.Polish: Ja, eee… Tak. Chyba właśnie rozwaliłem naszego drona.
Key.Russian: Эээ.. я... эм... Кажется, я только что разбил наш дрон.
Key.German: Ich, ähm … Ich glaube, ich hab gerade unsere Drohne zu Schrott geflogen.
Key.Czech: Ehm. Asi jsem odrovnal našeho drona.
Key.English: I, uh... yeah. I think I just totaled our drone.
Key.Portuguese: Eu, uhn… é. Acho que acabei de detonar o nosso drone.
Key.Korean: 어, 나 말일세... 드론을 박살낸 것 같아.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我，呃...我想我刚彻底毁了我们的无人机。
Key.Japanese: あー、ええと…ドローンを 1 機オシャカにしたかもしれん。
Key.Turkish: Ben, ah... Evet. Sanırım dronumuzu tahrip ettim.

Container.name: 009_eve_minefield_exit
Container.situation: the drone leaves the southern minefield and the demining bombs are disabled.

Key.Original: Safety's on.
Key.Chinese: 進入安全模式。
Key.French: Sécurité activée.
Key.Spanish: Ya es seguro.
Key.Italian: Sicura inserita.
Key.Polish: Zabezpieczenie włączone.
Key.Russian: Он на предохранителе.
Key.German: Die Sicherung ist aktiv.
Key.Czech: Zajištěno.
Key.English: Safety's on.
Key.Portuguese: A segurança tá ativada.
Key.Korean: 안전할거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全。
Key.Japanese: 安全装置、オン。
Key.Turkish: Güvenlik açık.

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.French: Compris.
Key.Spanish: Entendido.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto.
Key.Polish: Zrozumiałem.
Key.Russian: Понял тебя.
Key.German: Verstanden.
Key.Czech: Dobře.
Key.English: Understood.
Key.Portuguese: Entendido.
Key.Korean: 알았어.
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。
Key.Japanese: 了解。
Key.Turkish: Anladım.

Container.name: 008_eve_drone_detector
Container.situation: the eod asks the driver about the drone's sensors.

Key.Original: Your drone's got a dedicated sensor - get close enough, and it'll detect any nearby explosives.
Key.Chinese: 無人機上的偵測器很靈敏，只要附近有爆裂物，它都能偵測出來。
Key.French: Le drone dispose d'un capteur. Si tu l'approches assez, il peut détecter tous les explosifs à portée.
Key.Spanish: El dron tiene un sensor dedicado: si te acercas lo suficiente, detectará los explosivos cercanos.
Key.Italian: Il tuo drone possiede un sensore dedicato: se si avvicina a sufficienza, rileverà tutti gli esplosivi nelle vicinanze.
Key.Polish: Twój dron ma dedykowany czujnik. Jeśli odpowiednio się zbliżysz, wykryje wszystkie pobliskie ładunki.
Key.Russian: На дроне есть специальный сенсор. Если пролететь низко над землей, то он обнаружит любые мины и боеприпасы.
Key.German: Deine Drohne hat einen speziellen Sensor. Wenn du nah genug ranfliegst, ortet sie alle Sprengkörper in der Nähe.
Key.Czech: Dron má speciální senzor. Detekuje všechny výbušniny poblíž.
Key.English: Your drone's got a dedicated sensor - get close enough, and it'll detect any nearby explosives.
Key.Portuguese: Seu drone tem um sensor dedicado. Se se aproximar perto o suficiente, ele vai detectar qualquer explosivo nas proximidades.
Key.Korean: 자네 드론은 전용 감지기가 달려 있어서 가까이 접근하면 주변 폭발물을 모두 탐지할 수 있다네.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的无人机有个专用感应器 - 如果靠得够近，它会探测到任何附近的炸弹。
Key.Japanese: ドローンに専用センサーが搭載されてる。十分近づけば、付近の爆薬をすべて検知できる。
Key.Turkish: Dronun özel bir sensöre sahiptir, biraz yaklaştığında yakındaki tüm patlayıcıları tespit edebilirim.

Key.Original: Question: how can I see if I've gotten all the mines?
Key.Chinese: 我有疑問，要怎麼知道地雷都清除乾淨了？
Key.French: Question : comment savoir si j'ai déclenché toutes les mines ?
Key.Spanish: Pregunta: ¿cómo puedo saber si he desactivado todas las minas?
Key.Italian: Domanda: come faccio a vedere se ho individuato tutte le mine?
Key.Polish: Pytanie: jak mogę sprawdzić, czy dorwałem wszystkie miny?
Key.Russian: Вопрос: как посмотреть, все ли мины я уничтожил?
Key.German: Frage: Woher weiß ich, ob ich alle Minen erwischt habe?
Key.Czech: Dotaz. Jak poznám, že jsem zneškodnil všechny miny?
Key.English: Question: how can I see if I've gotten all the mines?
Key.Portuguese: Dúvida: como faço para ver se peguei todas as minas?
Key.Korean: 질문있네. 지뢰를 모두 확인했다는 것을 어떻게 알 수 있나?
Key.Chinesesimp: 问题：我怎么知道我已经找到所有地雷了呢？
Key.Japanese: 質問。地雷をすべて爆破できたかどうかはどうやって確認すればいい？
Key.Turkish: Soru: Tüm mayınları hallettiğimi nasıl anlayabilirim?

Container.name: 007_eve_drone_safe_height
Container.situation: the player is warned about not dropping bombs too close to the ground. doing so will damage or destroy the drone.

Key.Original: Oh - and - very important.
Key.Chinese: 哦，對，有一點很重要。
Key.French: Au fait, n'oublie pas.
Key.Spanish: Ah, y muy importante:
Key.Italian: Oh, una cosa molto importante.
Key.Polish: Och, i bardzo ważna rzecz.
Key.Russian: Ах, да, самое главное:
Key.German: Oh, und noch was Wichtiges:
Key.Czech: Jo. Ještě jedna důležitá věc.
Key.English: Oh - and - very important.
Key.Portuguese: Ah, uma coisa muito importante.
Key.Korean: 아, 그리고 중요한 점.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯 - 还有 - 非常重要。
Key.Japanese: ああ、それと非常に大切なことをひとつ。
Key.Turkish: Ah ve çok önemli.

Key.Original: Do not drop any explosives if you're close to the ground.
Key.Chinese: 別在無人機接近地面的時候投放炸藥包。
Key.French: Il ne faut pas larguer d'explosifs trop près du sol.
Key.Spanish: ¡no sueltes ningún explosivo si estás cerca del suelo!
Key.Italian: Non sganciare esplosivi se sei vicino a terra.
Key.Polish: Nie zrzucaj żadnych ładunków, gdy jesteś blisko ziemi.
Key.Russian: Не сбрасывай боеприпасы, когда дрон близко к земле.
Key.German: Wirf keine Sprengsätze ab, wenn du nah am Boden bist.
Key.Czech: Nevypouštěj nálože, pokud jsi s dronem příliš nízko.
Key.English: Do not drop any explosives if you're close to the ground.
Key.Portuguese: Não libera nenhum explosivo se estiver perto do solo.
Key.Korean: 지상에 근접하면 어떤 폭발물도 투하하지 말게.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在接近地面的时候，别丢掷炸弹。
Key.Japanese: 地面に近い状態で炸薬を落とすなよ。
Key.Turkish: Yere yakınken herhangi bir patlayıcı atma.

Key.Original: Just - don't wreck the tech. Thirty meters-plus, please.
Key.Chinese: 千萬別弄壞了。至少保持三十公尺以上的距離，拜託。
Key.French: Je te demande simplement de faire attention. Trente mètres ou plus, s'il te plaît.
Key.Spanish: No mandes de paseo al pequeñín. A más de 30 metros, por favor.
Key.Italian: Non distruggere il drone. Vedi di restare a un'altezza di almeno trenta metri.
Key.Polish: Po prostu… nie niszcz sprzętu. Powyżej trzydziestu metrów, proszę.
Key.Russian: Просто постарайся не сломать технику. Не меньше тридцати метров над землей, пожалуйста.
Key.German: Pass einfach auf, dass du das Gerät nicht beschädigst. Bleib bitte auf über 30 Meter Flughöhe.
Key.Czech: Prostě se snaž nepoškodit techniku. Udržuj drona aspoň ve třicetimetrové výšce. Dík.
Key.English: Just - don't wreck the tech. Thirty meters-plus, please.
Key.Portuguese: Só não destrói o bagulho. Trinta metros pra mais, por favor.
Key.Korean: 최첨단 장비만 폭파시키지 말게. 30미터 떨어지고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 别毁了高科技设备。拜托保持三十米以上的高度。
Key.Japanese: とにかく。ハイテク機器を壊さないでくれよ。30 メートルは高度を確保してくれ。
Key.Turkish: Teknolojiyi enkaza döndürme yeter. Otuz metre üzeri, lütfen.

Key.Original: Come on, Andy. What do you take me for?
Key.Chinese: 拜託喔，Andy。你當我是什麼？菜鳥嗎？
Key.French: Andy, tu me prends pour qui ?
Key.Spanish: Vamos, Andy. ¿Por quién me tomas?
Key.Italian: E dai Andy. Per chi mi hai preso?
Key.Polish: Daj spokój, Andy. Za kogo ty mnie masz?
Key.Russian: Серьезно, Энди? За кого ты меня принимаешь?
Key.German: Komm schon, Andy. Für wie blöd hältst du mich?
Key.Czech: Andy, prosím tě. Za co mě máš?
Key.English: Come on, Andy. What do you take me for?
Key.Portuguese: Pô, Andy! Você acha que eu sou o quê?
Key.Korean: 이봐. 앤디. 날 뭘로 보는 건가?
Key.Chinesesimp: 得了吧，Andy。你把我当什么了？
Key.Japanese: おいおい。俺を誰だと思ってるんだ、アンディ？
Key.Turkish: Haydi ama Andy. Beni ne sanıyorsun?

Container.name: 006_eve_drone_crosshair_and_ammo
Container.situation: the hud crosshair and ammo count is explained to the player.

Key.Original: Okay - now. The bombs. You only got four.
Key.Chinese: 好。炸藥包的話，無人機一次只能帶四個。
Key.French: Bien. Les bombes. Tu n'en as que quatre.
Key.Spanish: Muy bien, y ahora, las bombas. Solo tienes cuatro,
Key.Italian: Okay, e adesso le bombe. Ne hai solo quattro.
Key.Polish: Dobra, dalej. Bomby. Masz tylko cztery.
Key.Russian: Теперь к бомбам. У тебя их только четыре.
Key.German: Okay, jetzt zu den Bomben. Du hast nur vier davon.
Key.Czech: Takže. Poslouchej. Nálože. Máš jen čtyři.
Key.English: Okay - now. The bombs. You only got four.
Key.Portuguese: Ok, agora, as bombas. Você só recebe quatro.
Key.Korean: 알았네. 지금은 이게 다야. 폭탄. 자네한테 4개가 주어질 거야.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧 - 现在。你只有四个炸弹。
Key.Japanese: よーし。では炸薬だが、4 個しか搭載していない。
Key.Turkish: Pekâlâ, şimdi. Bombalar. Sadece dört tane var.

Key.Original: Release one and it'll drop straight down. Simple physics. If you run out, fly over to the van... there's plenty spare.
Key.Chinese: 只要投放它就會直直掉下去。簡單的物理現象。炸藥包用完的話就飛回廂型車來，我們還有很多。
Key.French: Quand tu largues une bombe, elle tombe tout droit. Rien de plus simple. Si tu es à court, refais le plein à la camionnette. On en a plein.
Key.Spanish: y si lanzas una, caerá directamente en línea recta. Vamos, física básica. Si te quedas sin bombas, vuelve a la furgoneta. Tienes de sobra.
Key.Italian: Rilasciane una e cadrà giù, dritto per dritto. Semplice fisica. Se non ne hai più, vola verso il furgone… ci sono scorte in grandi quantità.
Key.Polish: Zrzuć jedną, a poleci prosto w dół. Podstawy fizyki. Jeśli bomby ci się skończą, wróć do furgonetki. Mamy sporo w zapasie.
Key.Russian: Отпустишь одну из них, и она полетит прямиком вниз. Простая физика. Если у тебя закончатся бомбы, просто подлети к фургону... у нас их там целая куча.
Key.German: Wirf eine ab und sie fällt gerade herunter. Einfache Physik. Wenn du keine mehr hast, flieg rüber zum Transporter … wir haben genug davon dabei.
Key.Czech: Když jednu vypustíš, začne padat po přímce k zemi. Jednoduchá fyzika. Když ti nálože dojdou, přileť s dronem k dodávce. Náloží máme dostatek.
Key.English: Release one and it'll drop straight down. Simple physics. If you run out, fly over to the van... there's plenty spare.
Key.Portuguese: Libere uma e ela vai cair em linha reta. Física básica. Se acabar, voa até a camionete… tem muito mais sobrando.
Key.Korean: 하나를 방출하면 곧장 투하되는 거지. 간단한 공식이지. 폭탄이 다 떨어지면, 밴으로 날아보게. 여분이 충분하니까.
Key.Chinesesimp: 释放一个，它将垂直落下。简单的物理学原理。如果用光了，飞到面包车那去...那有很多备用的。
Key.Japanese: 一個切り離せばまっすぐ下へ落ちていく。物理法則そのままだな。もし無くなったらバンまで戻せばいい。予備の炸薬はまだまだある。
Key.Turkish: Birini bıraktığında doğrudan aşağı düşer. Basit fizik. Bittiğinde, panelvana uç... Bir sürü yedek var.

Key.Original: Thanks.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝。
Key.French: Merci.
Key.Spanish: Gracias.
Key.Italian: Grazie.
Key.Polish: Dzięki.
Key.Russian: Спасибо.
Key.German: Danke.
Key.Czech: Díky.
Key.English: Thanks.
Key.Portuguese: Valeu.
Key.Korean: 고맙네.
Key.Chinesesimp: 多谢。
Key.Japanese: わかった。
Key.Turkish: Teşekkürler.

Container.name: 005_eve_minefield_enter
Container.situation: the drone approaches the southern minefield and its demining bombs are enabled.

Key.Original: Head's up. Enabling charges.
Key.Chinese: 先提醒你，炸藥模式啟動了。
Key.French: Attention, j'active les charges.
Key.Spanish: Aviso. Activando las cargas.
Key.Italian: Occhio. Sto attivando le cariche.
Key.Polish: Uwaga. Aktywuję ładunki.
Key.Russian: Осторожно. Активирую заряды.
Key.German: Vorsicht, Sprengsätze werden gezündet.
Key.Czech: Bacha. Aktivuji nálože.
Key.English: Head's up. Enabling charges.
Key.Portuguese: Atenção. Ativando cargas.
Key.Korean: 조심하구. 화약을 활성화시키고.
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心，启用炸药。
Key.Japanese: 報告、これから起爆可能に切り替えるぞ。
Key.Turkish: Dikkat. İmla haklarını etkinleştirme.

Container.name: 004_eve_drone_controlled
Container.situation: player takes control of the demining drone.

Key.Original: You got it?
Key.Chinese: 了解吧？
Key.French: Ça se passe bien ?
Key.Spanish: ¿Lo tienes?
Key.Italian: Tutto okay?
Key.Polish: Gotowy?
Key.Russian: Все понял?
Key.German: Klappts?
Key.Czech: Vše v pohodě?
Key.English: You got it?
Key.Portuguese: Pegou?
Key.Korean: 알았지!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你明白了吗？
Key.Japanese: やれそうか？
Key.Turkish: Onu aldın mı?

Key.Original: So, you're gonna wanna use the auto-hover mode.
Key.Chinese: 你應該想使用自動盤旋模式。
Key.French: Tu vas devoir utiliser le vol stationnaire auto.
Key.Spanish: Bueno, será mejor que uses el modo de planeo automático.
Key.Italian: Allora, ti conviene usare la modalità di stazionamento automatico.
Key.Polish: Przyda ci się tryb automatycznego zawisu.
Key.Russian: Итак, тебе лучше использовать режим автостабилизации.
Key.German: Am besten nutzt du den automatischen Schwebemodus.
Key.Czech: Takže bych ti radil používat stabilizaci.
